title: Software Engineer
description:
Overview:
**Job Title:** Software Engineer

**Summary:**  

The Software Engineer will collaborate with a team of developers and business analysts to develop new products and enhance existing systems. Success in this role requires strong critical thinking and problem\-solving skills.

**Essential Duties and Responsibilities:**

* Develop software according to given requirements and technical specifications.
* Work with WebAPI and JSON.
* Engage in database development, including SQL scripts, stored procedures, functions, and triggers.
* Create user interfaces and client displays.
* Design and develop complex application features.
* Produce well\-organized, optimized, and documented source code.
* Debug existing source code and refine feature sets.
* Contribute to technical design documentation.
* Build and execute unit test cases to ensure code quality.
* Test the product in controlled, real situations before deployment.
* Innovate and develop high\-value technology solutions to streamline processes.
* Coordinate with other developers and cross\-functional teams.
* Work independently when required.
* Maintain attention to detail and ensure tasks are carried out to the highest standard.

 **Supervisory Responsibilities:**  

This is not a supervisory role. You will receive general instructions on routine work and detailed instructions on new projects or assignments.

 **Education Qualification:**

* Bachelor’s or master’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or related work experience.
* 3\-5 years of related experience.

 **Skills and Competencies:**

* Significant experience with Microsoft platform (.NET, MVC, C\#, T\-SQL).
* Experience with SQL Server and relational databases.
* Strong experience with SQL Queries (Stored procedures, Functions, Views, etc.).
* Experience working with APIs and microservices.
* Experience in MVC architecture.
* Proficiency with HTML 5, Web Services/SOAP, XML, JSON, WCF, and Web APIs.
* Experience with client\-side JavaScript technologies like Angular or React (experience with both preferred).
* Experience integrating and working with 3rd party tools like AJAX, Kendo.
* Prior experience with performance tuning and related tools is an added advantage.
* Knowledge of design patterns and entity frameworks is an added advantage.
* Strong understanding of OOPS concepts.
* Experience with versioning tools like Tortoise SVN/Team Foundation Server/GIT.
* Solid background in Software Development Life Cycle.
* Enthusiasm for working on innovative products and technologies.
* Ability to work independently and in small teams.
* Adaptability to fast\-paced environments and eagerness to stay updated with the latest trends.

  

You can copy and paste this text into your document. If you need any further adjustments or have any other requests, feel free to let me know!
company_description: Our solutions enable a vision of digitally transforming the healthcare payer industry, resulting in lower administrative costs and improved patient outcomes and quality.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
**Job Location: Indore (On\-site)**



We are seeking a skilled **Full Stack Developer** with hands\-on experience in both front\-end and back\-end development. The ideal candidate will have strong knowledge of modern JavaScript frameworks, backend technologies, database management, and REST API development. This role requires a passion for building high\-quality, scalable web applications and the ability to work collaboratively with cross\-functional teams.


**Key Responsibilities:**


* Develop, test, and deploy web applications using modern full\-stack technologies.
* Design, implement, and maintain scalable backend services and APIs.
* Build responsive and interactive UI components using React.js or similar frameworks.
* Work with relational and/or NoSQL databases for efficient data storage and retrieval.
* Collaborate with product managers, designers, and QA to deliver high\-quality solutions.
* Code development in alignment with best practices and preferably using low code platforms
* Participate in code reviews, ensuring best practices and clean code principles.
* Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize performance across the stack.
* Stay up\-to\-date with emerging technologies and suggest improvements to the tech stack.


**Required Skills \& Experience:**


* Minimum 5 to 6 years of professional experience as a Full Stack Developer.
* Strong proficiency in **Java, Spring Boot, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3**.
* Hands\-on experience with **React.js** or **Python Django** for front\-end development.
* Proficiency in backend development with **Java Spring Boot Or Python**. **Node.js** (Next\\Express.js or similar) is Plus
* Experience working with RDBMS and/or **NoSQL DB like Document DB or MongoDB**.
* Experience developing SaaS applications on **Azure/AWS** cloud
* Experience with any unit test framework like **Jest**, Mocha, or Cypress.
* Strong understanding of **RESTful APIs** and integration.
* Familiarity with **Git** or other version control systems.
* Experience on Agile Scrum, Kanban or SAFe
* Good problem\-solving skills and ability to work in a fast\-paced environment.


**Nice to Have:**


* Experience on mobile development \- React Native, Flutter etc
* Exposure to CI/CD pipelines and DevOps tools.
* Exposure to Statistical Code Analysis tools like SonarQube
* Knowledge of TypeScript

-----------


We're Concentrix. The intelligent transformation partner. Solution\-focused. Tech\-powered. Intelligence\-fueled. The global technology and services leader that powers the world’s best brands, today and into the future. We’re solution\-focused, tech\-powered, intelligence\-fueled. With unique data and insights, deep industry expertise, and advanced technology solutions, we’re the intelligent transformation partner that powers a world that works, helping companies become refreshingly simple to work, interact, and transact with. We shape new game\-changing careers in over 70 countries, attracting the best talent. The Concentrix Technical Products and Services team is the driving force behind Concentrix’s transformation, data, and technology services. We integrate world\-class digital engineering, creativity, and a deep understanding of human behavior to find and unlock value through tech\-powered and intelligence\-fueled experiences. We combine human\-centered design, powerful data, and strong tech to accelerate transformation at scale. You will be surrounded by the best in the world providing market leading technology and insights to modernize and simplify the customer experience. Within our professional services team, you will deliver strategic consulting, design, advisory services, market research, and contact center analytics that deliver insights to improve outcomes and value for our clients. Hence achieving our vision. Our game\-changers around the world have devoted their careers to ensuring every relationship is exceptional. And we’re proud to be recognized with awards such as "World's Best Workplaces," “Best Companies for Career Growth,” and “Best Company Culture,” year after year. Join us and be part of this journey towards greater opportunities and brighter futures.**Description**
---------------


Software Development  

1\. Having 4\+ years of experience and 4\+ years of experience on React is a MUST  

2\. Working with latest React and Redux versions  

3\. Having experience in Both JavaScript as well as Typescript (MUST)  

4\.Unit Testing knowledge with JEST and RTL is a MUST  

5\. Having experience working with projects from inception, (So that we can decide to either go with Manual Project setup or with create react app command)  

6\. Knowledge of Java (Good to have)  

Location: Bangalore

title: Senior Spartacus UI Developer
description:
**Job Description:**
--------------------

  

* About the job
* Join our dynamic team as a Senior Spartacus UI Developer where innovation meets creativity We are looking for passionate developers who thrive in a collaborative environment and are eager to push the boundaries of web development
* You will play a pivotal role in crafting seamless user experiences with Spartacus and Headless CMS leveraging your expertise in Angular JS to create cutting edge solutions
* Your work will not only impact our projects but also inspire your colleagues fostering a culture of innovation and excellence
* Dive into this exciting opportunity to shape the future of UI development with us

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
-------------------------

  

* Key Responsibilities
* Develop and maintain high quality web applications using Spartacus
* Implement and integrate Headless CMS solutions to enhance user experiences
* Collaborate with cross functional teams to define and design innovative solutions
* Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability
* Mentor junior developers and provide technical guidance

  

**Technical Requirements:**
---------------------------

  

* Minimum Qualifications
* Bachelor s or Master s degree in Computer Science Engineering or related field B
* Tech BE M
* Tech ME MCA MSc
* Proven experience in Spartacus and Headless CMS development 5 years
* Preferred Qualifications
* Extensive experience with Angular JS and its ecosystem
* Strong problem solving skills and ability to work independently
* Experience in leading development projects and managing teams
* Familiarity with modern web development practices and tools
* Excellent communication skills and ability to articulate technical concepts
* Good to have skills React Node
* js TypeScript Webpack RESTful APIs

  

**Additional Responsibilities:**
--------------------------------

  

* About us
* Infosys is a global leader in next generation digital services and consulting
* We enable clients in more than 50 countries to navigate their digital transformation
* With over four decades of experience in managing the systems and workings of global enterprises we expertly steer our clients through their digital journey
* We do it by enabling the enterprise with an AI powered core that helps prioritize the execution of change
* We also empower the business with agile digital at scale to deliver unprecedented levels of performance and customer delight
* Our always on learning agenda drives their continuous improvement through building and transferring digital skills expertise and ideas from our innovation ecosystem
* Infosys provides equal employment opportunities to applicants and employees without regard to race color sex gender identity sexual orientation religious practices and observances national origin pregnancy childbirth or related medical conditions status as a protected veteran or spouse family member of a protected veteran or disability

  

**Preferred Skills:**
---------------------


Technology\-\>Digital Commerce\-\>Storefront\-\>Spartacus

* You will plan the activities of configuration configure the product as per the design conduct conference room pilots and will assist in resolving any queries related to requirements and solution design
* You will conduct solution product demonstrations POC Proof of Technology workshops and prepare effort estimates which suit the customer budgetary requirements and are in line with organization s financial guidelines
* Actively lead small projects and contribute to unit level and organizational initiatives with an objective of providing high quality value adding solutions to customers

* Primary skills Technology Reactive Programming react JS Technology UI Markup Language Vue
* js

* Ability to develop value creating strategies and models that enable clients to innovate drive growth and increase their business profitability
* Good knowledge on software configuration management systems
* Awareness of latest technologies and Industry trends
* Logical thinking and problem solving skills along with an ability to collaborate
* Understanding of the financial processes for various types of projects and the various pricing models available

title: Sr. Software Engineer B2
description:
**Job Summary**


We are seeking a Sr. Software Engineer B2 with 5 to 9 years of experience to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have expertise in Node JS Cloud Basics React Angular and .Net. This role involves developing innovative software solutions that align with our companys mission. The position is hybrid offering a balance between remote and in\-office work and operates during day shifts.

  



**Responsibilities**

* Develop high\-quality software design and architecture using Node JS React Angular and .Net to meet project requirements.
* Collaborate with cross\-functional teams to define design and ship new features that enhance user experience.
* Ensure the performance quality and responsiveness of applications by conducting thorough testing and debugging.
* Implement cloud\-based solutions to improve scalability and efficiency of software applications.
* Maintain code quality organization and automation to ensure seamless integration and deployment.
* Participate in code reviews to maintain high standards of code quality and share knowledge with team members.
* Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to incorporate best practices into development processes.
* Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior developers to foster a collaborative learning environment.
* Work closely with product management to understand business requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
* Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability ensuring they meet the needs of our users.
* Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues to ensure smooth operation of software applications.
* Contribute to the continuous improvement of development processes and methodologies.
* Engage in regular team meetings to discuss project progress and brainstorm innovative solutions.

  



**Qualifications**

* Possess strong proficiency in Node JS React Angular and .Net with a solid understanding of cloud basics.
* Demonstrate experience in developing and deploying cloud\-based applications.
* Have a good understanding of data governance principles which is a plus.
* Exhibit excellent problem\-solving skills and the ability to work independently and collaboratively.
* Show strong communication skills to effectively convey technical concepts to non\-technical stakeholders.
* Display a proactive approach to learning new technologies and improving existing skills.
* Hold a bachelors degree in computer science engineering or a related field.
company_description: We help companies modernise technology, reimagine processes and transform experiences so they can thrive in a world that never stops evolving.

title: Software Engineer- React & NodeJS
description:
The primary role of Engineering function within Product Development team is to create specifications and designs for new products or improvements and enhancements to existing products. Works closely with customers, developers and other stakeholders to understand and define customer needs in these designs. Features are aligned to a timetable and areas of responsibility. Developers may solicit customers for feedback regarding product usability and desired future enhancements. Software Engineers who design, write and test code for the product should be matched in the either Software Engineering Applications or Systems. Product developers who specialize in hardware systems should be matched to Hardware Engineering.  



We are seeking a skilled Fullstack Developer for developing large\-scale services in a distributed cloud environment. The candidate should be passionate, self\-motivated, able to multitask effectively and have strong communication skills. Daily tasks include backend development, frontend development, testing, CI/CD, participating in scrum activities and collaboration with Support, Product Management and Delivery team.  



**Responsibilities**

* Design, develop, and maintain scalable and high\-performance full\-stack applications using Node.js, React, JavaScript and TypeScript.
* Build secure, maintainable RESTful APIs and integrate them with front\-end components.
* Write clean, modular, and reusable code and adhere to best practices in software engineering.
* Develop and optimize queries and schemas for MySQL databases, including complex joins, indexing, and transaction handling.
* Participate in sprint planning, daily standups, code reviews, and retrospective meetings as part of an agile team.
* Collaborate with UX designers, QA engineers, product owners, and other developers to deliver business value iteratively.
* Debug and troubleshoot issues across the stack, from database and backend to front\-end rendering and user interactions.
* Participate in architectural design discussions and contribute to decisions around design patterns, scalability, and performance.
* Write and maintain unit and integration tests to ensure code quality and application reliability.
* Contribute to documentation and knowledge sharing within the team.
* Actively look for ways to improve existing solutions and development workflows through automation, refactoring, and adoption of modern technologies.

**Qualifications and Experience**

* Bachelor's degree in computer science or related field, or equivalent industry experience.
* 3\-5 years of experience in full\-stack development using Node.js and React.
* Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including asynchronous programming concepts.
* Experience with microservices and micro\-frontend (MFE) architectures.
* Solid understanding of REST APIs, HTTP, and web architecture.
* Hands\-on experience with MySQL.
* Experience working with version control tools like Git and GitHub.
* Proficiency in debugging, profiling, and performance tuning of both client\-side and server\-side code.
* Strong knowledge of best practices in software engineering, including design patterns, and secure coding practices.
* Working knowledge of AWS services.
* Knowledge of testing frameworks
* Excellent communication, collaboration, and interpersonal skills.

Joining us is more than saying “yes” to making the world a healthier place. It’s discovering a career that’s challenging, supportive and inspiring. Where a culture driven by excellence helps you not only meet your goals, but also create new ones. We focus on creating a diverse and inclusive culture, encouraging individual expression in the workplace and thrive on the innovative ideas this generates. If this sounds like the workplace for you, apply now! We commit to respond to every applicant.

description:

Contribute to the enhancement and maintenance of one or more Charles River IMS modules or components as a senior member of an agile scrum team. Provide engineering troubleshooting assistance to customer support teams and other development teams within Charles River.
Responsibilities:* Work under minimal supervision to analyze, design, develop, test, and debug small to medium software enhancements and solutions within Charles River’s business and technical problem domains
* Collaborate with Business Analysts and Product Managers to turn business requirements of moderate complexity into working and sustainable software
* Participate in the design of product architecture within the team’s scope of responsibility
* Develop, test, debug, and implement software programs, applications and projects using Java, C\#, SQL, JavaScript, or other related software engineering languages
* Provide thoughtful insight and suggestions in code reviews
* Write unit and automation tests to ensure a high quality end product
* Conduct manual tests to ensure a high quality end product
* Contribute to written design and API documentation, and participate in customer documentation process
* Actively participate in the agile software development process by adhering to the CRD scrum methodology including attending all daily standups, sprint planning, backlog grooming, and retrospectives
* Participate in cross\-team group activities to complete assignments


Qualifications:
Education:
B.S. degree (or foreign education equivalent) in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, and Physics or other technical course of study required. MS degree strongly preferred.

title: Senior Front End Developer
description:
**Job Title: Senior Frontend Developer – React \& Next.js (Chatbot \& Dashboard)**

**Company Overview:**

Mintrix is an AI\-powered SaaS EdTech startup transforming school operations. Our platform leverages **AI agents, RAG\-powered chatbots, and automation systems** to empower teachers, students, administrators, and parents. We combine **modern frontend technologies, reactive UI design, and AI integrations** to create highly interactive, responsive, and scalable interfaces.

**Role Overview**

We are looking for a creative and technically strong Sr. Front End Developer with expertise in React.js, Django and a passion for crafting seamless, animated, and highly interactive user interfaces. You’ll work closely with our product and backend teams to deliver cutting\-edge features, leveraging Next.js and consuming FastAPI endpoints—including real\-time/streaming data integrations. You will be responsible for building **responsive, fast\-loading dashboards, dynamic chatbot interfaces, and interactive visualizations** that integrate seamlessly with our AI\-driven backend.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Develop and maintain **React/Next.js web applications** with responsive, mobile\-first designs.
* Build **modern dashboards and Chatbot UIs** with micro\-animation, smooth transitions, and interactive elements with responsiveness across devices (desktop, tablet, mobile).
* Implement **state management** using Redux, React Context, and hooks to handle complex workflows and session memory.
* Integrate **REST APIs and WebSocket endpoints** with backend systems for real\-time data updates.
* Collaborate closely with **backend and AI teams** to implement RAG\-based chatbots and AI agents.
* Create pixel\-perfect components based on UI/UX designs (Figma/Adobe XD).
* Optimize UI performance and ensure consistent cross\-browser and cross\-device behavior.
* Maintain clean, modular, and reusable code using component\-based design.
* architecture. Participate in code reviews, agile sprints, and team standups.

**Minimum Qualifications**

* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
* **2\-4 years of frontend development experience** with React and .
* Strong proficiency in **JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Django templates**.
* Proficiency in **REST APIs, WebSocket integration**, and asynchronous data handling.
* Familiarity with **backend systems** and AI integration workflows.
* Strong understanding of **responsive design, browser compatibility, and performance optimization**.
* Experience with version control, **Git, CI/CD pipelines, and** familiar with agile development methodology.

**Preferred Skills**

* Experience building **chatbot UIs, AI\-powered dashboards, or real\-time analytics tools**.
* Knowledge of **micro\-animations, motion libraries (Framer Motion), and interactive visualizations**.
* Familiarity with **Figma and UI/ research, and Design.**
* Understanding of **multi\-tenant SaaS frontend architectures**.
* Strong **UI/UX sensibilities** and experience collaborating with designers.
* Experience with **unit testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library)**.

**What We Offer**

* **Competitive salary** with performance\-based bonuses.
* **Fully remote** and flexible work environment.
* Direct involvement in building **AI\-powered school automation products**.
* Opportunities to work with **modern frontend technologies and LLM\-powered AI systems**.
* Collaborative and growth\-oriented **startup culture** with access to leadership and R\&D teams.

**How to Apply**

title: Full Stack Python Developer
description:
Onebridge, a Marlabs Company, is a global AI and Data Analytics Consulting Firm that empowers organizations worldwide to drive better outcomes through data and technology. Since 2005, we have partnered with some of the largest healthcare, life sciences, financial services, and government entities across the globe. We have an exciting opportunity for a highly skilled Full Stack Python Developer to join our innovative and dynamic team.


**Full Stack Python Developer \| About You**

  

As a Full Stack Python Developer, you will design, develop, and maintain scalable web applications and services using modern technologies. You are comfortable working across the stack, from building robust APIs and backend systems to creating intuitive, responsive front\-end interfaces. You thrive in cloud\-based environments and have experience deploying applications on Microsoft Azure. You're passionate about clean code, performance optimization, and delivering high\-quality solutions that meet business needs.


**Full Stack Python Developer \| Day\-to\-Day**

  

* Design, build, and deploy full stack applications using Python (FastAPI, Flask, Django) and React.
* Develop and maintain RESTful APIs and integrate with external services and data sources.
* Implement secure, scalable, and high\-performing solutions on the Microsoft Azure cloud platform.
* Collaborate with cross\-functional teams including product managers, designers, and other engineers to deliver end\-to\-end solutions.
* Ensure code quality through testing, code reviews, and adherence to best practices.
* Support DevOps practices including containerization (Docker), CI/CD pipelines, and Azure\-native deployment tools (e.g., Azure DevOps, Azure Kubernetes Service).


**Full Stack Python Developer \| Skills \& Experience**

  

* 4\+ years of professional experience in full stack development.
* Strong proficiency in Python and frameworks such as FastAPI, Flask, or Django.
* Hands\-on experience with React (bonus for TypeScript).
* Experience deploying and managing applications on Microsoft Azure (e.g., Azure App Service, Azure Functions, Azure Storage).
* Familiarity with containerization (Docker) and orchestration (Kubernetes is a plus).
* Solid understanding of relational and NoSQL databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
* Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and version control (Git).
* Excellent problem\-solving and communication skills; ability to work in agile environments.
company_description: Onebridge is a BI & Data Analytics Consulting firm with an HQ in Indianapolis, and clients dispersed throughout the United States and beyond.

title: Rust developer
description:
Job Title: Rust Developer

Location: Bangalore, India

Experience: 4\-5 years

**About Us:**

We are a leading technology company based in Bangalore, specializing in Generative AI solutions. Our mission is to create cutting\-edge software that powers the next generation of AI\-driven applications. We work on challenging and innovative projects that push the boundaries of AI, machine learning, and automation. We are looking for a skilled Rust Developer with 4\-5 years of experience to join our dynamic team and contribute to building scalable, high\-performance systems.

**Key Responsibilities:**

 Develop and Maintain Software Solutions: Design, implement, and optimize high\-

performance applications using Rust, ensuring scalability, reliability, and security for

AI\-driven systems.

 Collaborate with AI \& ML Teams: Work closely with data scientists, machine learning

engineers, and product managers to integrate AI models into robust software

solutions.

 Performance Optimization: Identify bottlenecks and improve the performance of AI\-

driven applications, particularly in handling large datasets and intensive

computations.

 Code Reviews \& Mentorship: Conduct peer code reviews and provide mentorship to

junior developers, fostering a collaborative development environment.

 Testing \& Debugging: Write and maintain unit, integration, and performance tests to

ensure the robustness of AI applications.

 Stay Updated with Industry Trends: Continuously explore new tools, libraries, and

techniques to improve development processes and product quality, especially within

the generative AI and Rust ecosystems.

**Qualifications:**

 4\-5 years of hands\-on experience in software development, with a strong focus on

system\-level programming and performance optimization.

 Proficiency in Rust programming language with a solid understanding of Rust's

ownership model, memory management, and concurrency patterns.

 Experience working with microservices architecture and cloud\-based environments

such as AWS, GCP, or Azure.

 Strong knowledge of Linux\-based systems and experience with multi\-threaded

programming.

 Familiarity with system\-level design principles, low\-level programming, and network

protocols.

 Good understanding of CI/CD pipelines, Git version control, and container

technologies like Docker or Kubernetes.

 Experience in integrating or working with AI/ML frameworks or tools is a plus.

 Knowledge of other programming languages like C/C\+\+, Go, or Python is

advantageous.

Job Type: Full\-time

Pay: Up to ₹1,400,000\.00 per year

Benefits:

* Health insurance
* Provident Fund

Work Location: In person

title: Senior Odoo Engineer
description:
We are looking for an **Odoo Techno\-Functional Consultant** with 2 to 6 years of experience who can bridge the gap between technical development and functional implementation. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of the Odoo framework, hands\-on experience in Python development, and a deep knowledge of Odoo modules. Additionally, expertise in AI enhancement for business process automation will be a plus.

**Job Type:** Full\-time, Permanent  
**Work Location:** Remote

**Key Responsibilities:**

* **Requirement Gathering \& Analysis:** Understand customer requirements and analyze the gap between existing Odoo functionalities and business needs.
* **Odoo Development:** Develop and customize Odoo modules using Python, XML, and JavaScript.
* **Database Management:** Work with PostgreSQL for database management, performance tuning, and optimization.
* **Customization \& Integration:** Customize Odoo workflows and integrate third\-party applications to enhance system capabilities.
* **AI Enhancements:** Implement AI\-driven solutions for automation, predictive analytics, and intelligent decision\-making within Odoo.
* **Code Review \& Optimization:** Analyse
* existing code and adapt it to meet new business requirements efficiently.
* **Technical Troubleshooting:** Diagnose and resolve issues related to Odoo functionality, workflows, and system integrations.
* **Training \& Documentation:** Provide user training, create technical documentation, and assist in system deployment.

**Required Skills \& Qualifications:**

* **Technical Skills:**
* Strong proficiency in **Python, XML, and JavaScript** for Odoo development.
* In\-depth knowledge of the **Odoo framework and its core modules**.
* Experience with **PostgreSQL database management**.
* Understanding of **object\-oriented programming, object modeling, and relational databases**.
* Familiarity with **Unix/Linux environments**.
* Hands\-on experience in integrating Odoo with third\-party applications.
* Knowledge of **AI/ML technologies** to enhance Odoo functionalities is a plus.
* **Functional Skills:**
* Ability to **analyze business processes** and translate them into Odoo configurations.
* Strong understanding of **Odoo workflows, reporting, and user role management**.
* Experience in handling **Odoo migrations and upgrades**.
* Knowledge of **accounting, inventory, sales, and procurement modules** in Odoo is desirable.
* **Soft Skills:**
* Excellent **problem\-solving and analytical skills**.
* Strong **communication and stakeholder management**.
* Ability to **work independently and in a team**.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

* Experience as a **Python Developer or Java Developer** for at least 2 years.
* Prior experience working as an **Odoo Functional or Technical Consultant**.
* AI\-based automation experience is an added advantage.

**Experience:**

* total: 2 years (Required)
* Odoo Modules: 2 years (Required)

Job Types: Full\-time, Permanent

Pay: From ₹50,000\.00 per month

Benefits:

* Work from home

Experience:

* E\-Commerce: 3 years (Preferred)

Work Location: Remote

title: QA Engineer
description:
**Job Summary**:  
**Job Description – QA Engineer (4–6 Years Experience)Key Responsibilities**

* Lead and execute testing for new features and critical user flows across web and mobile platforms.
* Perform **manual testing** (functional, regression, exploratory, UAT) with minimal supervision.
* Design, develop, and execute **test automation scripts** using frameworks/tools (e.g., Selenium, Playwright, Cypress, TestNG, JUnit, PyTest).
* Conduct **API testing** using tools like Postman, REST Assured, or similar frameworks.
* Log, track, and prioritize defects in tools like **JIRA**, and work closely with developers for timely resolution.
* Create, maintain, and review **test cases, test plans, and test reports** ensuring high test coverage.
* Participate in **Agile ceremonies** (daily standups, sprint planning, retrospectives) and contribute to sprint deliverables.
* Collaborate with DevOps to integrate test automation within **CI/CD pipelines** (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, or similar).
* Mentor junior QA engineers and interns, sharing best practices and driving quality culture within the team.

**What We’re Looking For**

* **4–6 years of hands\-on QA experience** in both manual and automation testing.
* Strong proficiency in at least one programming language (**Java, Python, or JavaScript**) with proven experience in test automation.
* Solid knowledge of **software development lifecycle, QA methodologies, and API/web services testing**.
* Experience with **test automation frameworks** (Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, REST Assured, etc.).
* Familiarity with **version control systems (Git/GitHub/GitLab)** and test management tools.
* Strong problem\-solving, debugging, and analytical skills with high attention to detail.
* Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively across teams.

**Nice to Have (Not Mandatory)**

* Experience in testing **e\-commerce platforms** or large\-scale web applications.
* Knowledge of **performance testing** (e.g., JMeter, Locust) or **security testing tools**.
* Exposure to **cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)** in the context of QA.
* Contribution to building/optimizing QA frameworks and processes.

**What You’ll Gain**

* Opportunity to lead QA efforts in a dynamic **e\-commerce environment**.
* Ownership of test automation strategy and end\-to\-end quality assurance.
* Work closely with cross\-functional teams including developers, product managers, and DevOps.
* Career growth into **Senior QA Engineer / QA Lead roles** based on performance.
* Continuous learning and upskilling opportunities with latest QA tools and practices

Job Types: Full\-time, Permanent

Pay: From ₹50,000\.00 per month

Benefits:

* Work from home

Experience:

* E\-Commerce: 2 years (Preferred)

Work Location: Remote

title: Lead Frontend Developer
description:
JD: Lead Frontend Dev  
Location: Pune, Hybrid \| Email: jobs@sarvaha.com  
Sarvaha is seeking a skilled and passionate Lead Frontend Developer with a minimum of 8\+  
years of hands\-on experience. You’ll work on challenging, high\-performance systems and  
collaborate with a talented team that values quality, ownership, and clean code.  
Sarvaha is a niche software development company that works with some of the best funded startups and established companies across the globe. Please visit our website at  
https://www.sarvaha.com to know more about us.

What You’ll Do

* Fluency in React.JS and solid knowledge of TypeScript for building maintainable, scalable, and type\-safe UIs.
* Experience building user interfaces for modern SaaS platforms, with a deep understanding of performance and usability.
* Strong understanding of accessibility standards (WCAG 2\.0\+) and proven ability to apply them in real projects.
* Hands\-on experience with micro frontends and modular architectures.
* Passion for software quality: testing, code reviews, clean abstractions, and maintainable

systems.

* Experience developing microservices or working with service\-oriented architectures.
* Familiarity with domain\-driven design (DDD) concepts and ability to apply them in frontend and shared domain models.
* Experience with one or more backend languages such as Java, Python, Ruby, or Go.
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, Gitlab), containerized deployments (Docker,

Kubernetes), and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) is a plus.

* Constant learner, eager to stay on top of evolving frontend and architectural trends.

You Bring

* BE/BTech/MTech (CS/IT or MCA), with an emphasis in Software Engineering
* Design and implement high\-quality frontend features for modern SaaS applications, with a strong emphasis on clean code and clean architecture best practices.
* Collaborate with peers to solidify designs through code reviews and architecture discussions, ensuring robust and maintainable solutions.
* Build accessible and inclusive UIs that comply with WCAG 2\.0\+ standards, making sure all

users have a seamless experience.

* Develop scalable components and contribute to micro frontend architectures, enabling modular and independent delivery of features.
* Partner closely with product managers and designers to clarify requirements, scope features, and deliver business value.
* Take ownership of features across the entire lifecycle: design, implementation, testing,

deployment, and operational excellence.

* Bring pride and craftsmanship to your work, being able to clearly articulate previous

accomplishments and the real\-world impact of the software you’ve built.

* Collaborate with backend teams to design and integrate with microservices, contributing ideas across the full stack. Needed Soft Skills
* Strong debugging and troubleshooting skills
* Ownership mindset and accountability
* Comfortable working in Agile teams and pair programming
* Proactive in documentation and sharing knowledge
* Empathetic collaborator and open to mentoring peers
* Passion for clean code, performance, and continuous improvement

Why Join Sarvaha?

* Top notch remuneration and excellent growth opportunities
* An excellent, no\-nonsense work environment with the very best people to work with
* Highly challenging software implementation problems
* Hybrid Mode. We offered complete work from home even before the pandemic.

Job Type: Full\-time

Pay: ₹3,097,491\.54 \- ₹3,586,373\.99 per year

Work Location: Hybrid remote in Pune, Maharashtra

title: .Net Developer
description:
**1\. Job Summary:**

We are seeking a skilled and motivated software developer to join our dynamic team. As a software developer, you will be responsible for designing, coding, testing, and maintaining software applications and systems. You will collaborate with cross\-functional teams to develop high\-quality software solutions that meet our business needs.

**2\. Key Responsibilities:**

* Software Development: Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code to develop software applications and systems.
* Programming: Use programming languages and tools to create software solutions (e.g., Java, JavaScript, Asp.Net, C\#, VB.Net, Python).
* Database Management: Design and maintain databases, ensuring data integrity and optimal performance.
* Problem Solving: Analyze user requirements and business needs to identify software solutions and resolve technical issues.
* Testing: Develop and execute unit tests and participate in code reviews to ensure the quality and reliability of the software.
* Documentation: Create and maintain technical documentation, including software architecture, code comments, and user manuals.
* Reporting: Developer with expertise in designing, developing, and maintaining SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) reports, who can leverage data visualization and reporting tools to deliver insightful and actionable business intelligence solutions.
* Collaboration: Work closely with cross\-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and quality assurance testers, to deliver projects on time.
* Continuous Learning: Stay up\-to\-date with industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies to enhance your skills and knowledge.

**3\. Qualifications:**

* BCA, MCA, B.E., B.Sc IT, M.Sc IT, PGDCA in computer science, software engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
* Proven experience in software development, with a strong portfolio of previous work.
* Proficiency in one or more programming languages and development tools.
* Knowledge of software development best practices, including agile methodologies.
* Strong problem\-solving and critical\-thinking skills.
* Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
* Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
* Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git or Azure) is a plus.
* Experience with web development, windows, or other specialized skills may be required for specific positions.

Job Type: Full\-time

Pay: Up to ₹50,000\.00 per month

Education:

* Bachelor's (Preferred)

Experience:

* .NET: 2 years (Preferred)
* total work: 4 years (Preferred)

Work Location: In person

* Collaborate with other developers, project managers, and stakeholders to identify and Develop new features Troubleshoot and debug issues in existing modules

* Experience with web development (JavaScript, HTML, CSS)

* Strong analytical and problem\-solving skills

title: Flutter/Python/Django Frontend/Backend Developer – Intern
description:
**Job Title:** Flutter/Python/Django Frontend/Backend Developer – Intern  
**Location:** Remote  
**Type:** Internship  
**Duration:** 1–3 Months  
**Start Date:** Immediate

**Application link** \- https://phalmora.com/software\-development

**About the Internship**

We are looking for a passionate and motivated **Python/Django Backend Developer Intern** to join our team for a School Management System project. This internship is ideal for students or recent graduates who want hands\-on experience working on a real\-world Django application.

You will collaborate with a small development team and contribute to important modules such as user registration, role\-based access, student/teacher/parent management, academic features, and more.

**Responsibilities**

* Assist in designing and developing Django models, APIs, and views
* Implement authentication and role\-based access for multiple user types (student, teacher, parent, etc.)
* Work on database relationships, serializers, and admin customizations
* Collaborate with the Flutter frontend team for API integration
* Debug and test APIs using Postman or Thunder Client
* Write clean, maintainable code following best practices
* Participate in code reviews and team meetings

**Requirements**

* Solid understanding of Python and Django
* Familiarity with Django REST Framework
* Basic understanding of relational databases (PostgreSQL/MySQL)
* Experience with Git version control
* Strong willingness to learn and contribute
* Good communication and time\-management skills

**Good to Have**

* Experience with authentication (JWT/Session\-based)
* Knowledge of frontend technologies (HTML, Flutter API integration)
* Prior experience with multi\-role systems or school management projects

**What You’ll Gain**

* Practical experience working on a real Django\-based project
* Guidance and mentorship from experienced developers
* Exposure to full project lifecycle and backend architecture
* Internship certificate and letter of recommendation upon successful completion
* Potential opportunity for a paid role based on performance and project funding

**Important Note**

This is an **internship**, ideal for freshers or students seeking to build their portfolio or fulfill college internship requirements.

**How to Apply**

Send your resume and GitHub/portfolio (if any) to: **hr@phalmora.com**  
You may also contact: **8529107330**

**Email Subject Line:** *Python Django Intern Application – \[Your Name]*

**Job Types**

Full\-time, Part\-time, Fresher, Internship  
**Contract Length:** 1 month

**Benefits**

* Work from home

**Schedule**

* Day shift
* Evening shift
* Fixed shift
* Monday to Friday
* Night shift

**Work Location:** Remote  
**Speak with the employer:** \+91 8253060846

Job Types: Full\-time, Part\-time, Internship

Pay: ₹5,000\.00 \- ₹15,000\.00 per month

Work Location: Remote

title: Full Stack Developer
company: KATALYSTCS - AGENTS OF CHANGE CONSULTING PRIVATE LIMITED
description:
**Full\-Stack Web Developer (React/Vue.js \+ Django / Python)**

We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Full\-Stack Web Developer to join our growing team. In this role, you will play a pivotal role in building and maintaining robust web applications, leveraging your expertise in both front\-end and back\-end development. You will have a strong understanding of CRM and ERR applications and be instrumental in customizing and integrating it with our existing packaged solutions being offered to customers.

**Responsibilities:**

**Front\-End Development:**

* Develop user interfaces using modern frameworks like React or Vue.js, ensuring exceptional user experience and responsiveness across various devices.
* Craft clean, maintainable, and well\-documented HTML5, CSS3, Java script, Bootstrap code and other Frameworks that adheres to best practices.
* Implement responsive web design (RWD) principles to ensure optimal experiences across all devices.
* Collaborate with designers to translate mockups into functional front\-end components.
* Integrate third\-party APIs for enhanced functionality.

**Back\-End Development**:

Build scalable and secure web applications using object\-oriented programming principles (Django /Python preferred).

Utilize frameworks like Django or Fast Api (Python) to build efficient and maintainable applications.

Develop custom functionalities and APIs for CRM and ERP to streamline business processes.

Implement MVC architecture for efficient code organization and maintainability.

**CRM Expertise:**

* Customize CRM modules (Account, Help Desk, Print Template, Workflow Automation) to meet specific business needs.
* Integrate CRM with other platforms
* Perform manual testing to ensure seamless integration and functionality.
* Design and develop HTML email templates.
* Write reusable and well\-structured code prioritizing cohesion and loose coupling.
* Collaborate effectively with designers, product managers, and other developers.
* **Functional Knowledge of CRM and how it is used in the industry**

**ERP Expertise:**

* Customize ERP modules (AR/AP, CoA, Sales documents, Purchase Documents, Inventory flow, HR, Print Template, Workflow Automation) to meet specific business needs.
* Integrate ERP with other platforms
* Perform manual testing to ensure seamless integration and functionality.
* Design and develop HTML email templates.
* Write reusable and well\-structured code prioritizing cohesion and loose coupling.
* Collaborate effectively with designers, product managers, and other developers.
* **Functional Knowledge of ERP and how it is used in the industry**

**Qualifications:**

* 1\-3 years of experience as a Full\-Stack Web Developer.
* In\-depth knowledge of front\-end technologies (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript).
* Proficiency in a modern front\-end framework (React or Vue.js preferred).
* Strong understanding of back\-end development concepts (object\-oriented programming, MVC architecture).
* Experience with Python and database programming for server\-side development (Django a plus).
* Familiarity with CRM and ERP tool customization and API integration.
* Experience integrating with third\-party APIs.
* Solid understanding of version control systems (Git preferred).
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
* Ability to work independently, manage multiple tasks effectively, and prioritize deadlines.
* Strong problem\-solving and analytical skills.
* Self\-motivated and adaptable to new technologies and frameworks.
* Bachelor's degree (BE/BTech) or Master's degree (ME/MTech) in Computer Science or Information Technology (preferred).

Why Join Us?

This role offers a unique opportunity to work on challenging and impactful projects, utilizing your full\-stack development expertise within a collaborative and supportive environment. You will have the chance to learn and grow your technical skill set while contributing to the development of innovative solutions for our business.

**Application requirements.**

Please note you need to answer all questions specifically for us to review your application. All applications with blank answers will be disqualified automatically.

Job Type: Full\-time

Pay: ₹150,000\.00 \- ₹250,000\.00 per year

Benefits:

* Leave encashment
* Paid sick time
* Paid time off
* Work from home

Application Question(s):

* What is your salary expectation? If it is more than advertised justify why we should consider.
* Are you willing to work in the Morning shift ( 6:00 A.m. to 3:00 P.M. )?
* What's your current Designation?

Education:

* Bachelor's (Required)

Experience:

* Angular / React / Vue.js: 1 year (Required)
* total work: 3 years (Required)
* Java / Python: 1 year (Required)

Language:

* English Proficiently (Required)

Work Location: Remote

title: AI/ML Engineer (Python Programming)
description:
At **Citi** we’re not just building technology, we’re building the future of banking. Encompassing a broad range of specialties, roles, and cultures, our teams are creating innovations used across the globe. Citi is constantly growing and progressing through our technology, with laser focused on evolving the ways of doing things. As one of the world’s most global banks we’re changing how the world does business

**Shape your Career with Citi**


We’re currently looking for a high caliber professional to join our team as **Officer, AI/ML Engineer (Python Programming)\- Hybrid** (Internal Job Title: **25924787** AI/ML Engineer\- C11\) based in Pune, India. Being part of our team means that we’ll provide you with the resources to meet your unique needs, empower you to make healthy decision and manage your financial well\-being to help plan for your future. For instance:

* We provide programs and services for your physical and mental well\-being including access to telehealth options, health advocates, confidential counseling and more. Coverage varies by country.
* We empower our employees to manage their financial well\-being and help them plan for the future.
* We provide access to an array of learning and development resources to help broaden and deepen your skills and knowledge as your career progresses.

**In this role, you’re expected to:**

* Utilize knowledge of applications development procedures and concepts, and basic knowledge of other technical areas to identify and define necessary system enhancements, including using script tools and analyzing/interpreting code.
* Consult with users, clients, and other technology groups on issues, and recommend programming solutions, install, and support customer exposure systems
* Apply fundamental knowledge of programming languages for design specifications.
* Analyze applications to identify vulnerabilities and security issues, as well as conduct testing and debugging
* Serve as advisor or coach to new or lower level analysts

**As a successful candidate, you’d ideally have the following skills and exposure:**

* **4\-8 years** of experience working as AI/ML Engineer or Developer.
* Excellent Proficiency in **Python Software Development**, following Object\-Oriented design patterns and best practices.
* Experience in using **Machine Learning/Deep Learning**: XGBoost, LightGBM, TensorFlow, PyTorch.
* Strong hands\-on experience in Machine Learning, delivering complex solutions to production.
* Experience with **Generative AI technologies essential**.
* Knowledge of **NLP,** Name Entity Recognition
* In\-depth knowledge of deep learning and Generative AI frameworks such as, Langchain, Lang Graph, Crew AI or similar.
* Experience with and other open\-source frameworks/ libraries/ APIs like Hugging Face Transformers, Spacy, Pandas, scikit\-learn, NumPy.


Working at Citi is far more than just a job. A career with us means joining a family of more than 230,000 dedicated people from around the globe. At Citi, you’ll have the opportunity to grow your career, give back to your community and make a real impact.

**Take the next step in your career, apply for this role at Citi today**

*https://jobs.citi.com/dei*


This job description provides a high\-level review of the types of work performed. Other job\-related duties may be assigned as required.


\-

**Job Family Group:**

Technology
\-

**Job Family:**


Applications Development
\-

**Time Type:**


Full time
\-

**Most Relevant Skills**

Please see the requirements listed above.
\-

**Other Relevant Skills**

Artificial Intelligence Software, Machine Learning (ML), Python (Programming Language).
\-

*Citi is an equal opportunity employer, and qualified candidates will receive consideration without regard to their race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, status as a protected veteran, or any other characteristic protected by law.*

 *If you are a person with a disability and need a reasonable accommodation to use our search tools and/or apply for a career opportunity review* *Accessibility at Citi**.*

title: Security Architect
description:
**Project Role :** Security Architect  

**Project Role Description :** Define the cloud security framework and architecture, ensuring it meets the business requirements and performance goals. Document the implementation of the cloud security controls and transition to cloud security\-managed operations.
  

**Must have skills :** Identity Access Management (IAM)  

**Good to have skills :** NA  

Minimum **3** year(s) of experience is required  

**Educational Qualification :** 15 years full time education  

  

Summary: Seeking a forward\-thinking professional with an AI\-first mindset to design, develop, and deploy enterprise\-grade solutions using Generative and Agentic AI frameworks that drive innovation, efficiency, and business transformation As an Application Developer, you will design, build, and configure applications to meet business process and application requirements. Your typical day will involve collaborating with cross\-functional teams to gather requirements, developing application features, and ensuring that the applications align with the overall business objectives. You will also engage in testing and debugging processes to enhance application performance and user experience, while continuously seeking opportunities for improvement and innovation in application development. Roles \& Responsibilities: Lead AI\-driven solution design and delivery by applying GenAI and Agentic AI to address complex business challenges, automate processes, and integrate intelligent insights into enterprise workflows for measurable impact. Expected to perform independently and become an SME. \- Required active participation/contribution in team discussions. \- Contribute in providing solutions to work related problems. \- Assist in the documentation of application specifications and user guides. \- Engage in code reviews to ensure quality and adherence to best practices. Professional \& Technical Skills: Strong grasp of Generative and Agentic AI, prompt engineering, and AI evaluation frameworks. Ability to align AI capabilities with business objectives while ensuring scalability, responsible use, and tangible value realization. Must To Have Skills: Proficiency in Identity Access Management (IAM). \- Strong understanding of application development frameworks and methodologies. \- Experience with programming languages such as Java, C\#, or Python. \- Familiarity with database management systems and SQL. \- Knowledge of security protocols and best practices in application development. Additional Information:\- The candidate should have minimum 2 years of experience in Identity Access Management (IAM). \- A 15 years full time education is required.


  

15 years full time education

title: Engineering Services Practitioner
description:
**Project Role :** Engineering Services Practitioner  

**Project Role Description :** Assist with end\-to\-end engineering services to develop technical engineering solutions to solve problems and achieve business objectives. Solve engineering problems and achieve business objectives using scientific, socio\-economic, technical knowledge and practical experience. Work across structural and stress design, qualification, configuration and technical management.
  

**Must have skills :** PySpark  

**Good to have skills :** NA  

Minimum **2** year(s) of experience is required  

**Educational Qualification :** 15 years full time education  

  

Summary: We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Skywise/Palantir Foundry Developer to join our team. This role is focused on leveraging the Airbus Skywise platform (built on Palantir Foundry) to transform complex aviation and operational data into actionable business intelligence, predictive insights, and robust digital solutions. The ideal candidate will be an expert in developing, deploying, and managing data pipelines and applications within the Foundry ecosystem to drive operational efficiency and support data\-driven decision\-making across our organization. Roles \& Responsibilities: Data Pipeline Engineering \& Orchestration: Design, develop, and maintain secure, scalable, and efficient ETL/ELT data pipelines using Code Repository (Python/PySpark/SQL) for transformation logic. Utilize Data Pipeline Builder and associated tools for the ingestion, scheduling, and orchestration of data flows from source systems into the Foundry environment. Implement robust data quality checks and monitoring throughout the pipeline lifecycle. Ontology Management: Define and manage the Foundry Ontology, including creating and linking Objects and Links to accurately represent real\-world entities and their relationships. Ensure proper data governance, security, and access controls are applied to the underlying datasets and the derived Ontology. Application \& Front\-End Development: Build dynamic, advanced dashboards and reports using Contour for deep\-dive analysis, aggregation, and visualization. Develop sophisticated, custom, and highly interactive applications for end\-users using Slate and/or Workshop. Apply relevant front\-end skills (e.g., JavaScript, HTML, CSS) where necessary to customize and enhance the user experience in Slate/Workshop applications. Stakeholder Collaboration: Work closely with business stakeholders to gather requirements, translate needs into technical specifications, and ensure delivered solutions drive measurable business value. Platform Expertise \& Support: Maintain, troubleshoot, and optimize existing Foundry solutions, ensuring high performance and reliability. Stay current with new features and best practices within the Palantir Foundry platform to continually enhance capabilities. Professional \& Technical Skills: Programming: Strong proficiency in Python, PySpark, and SQL. Platform Expertise: Extensive hands\-on experience with core Palantir Foundry tools: Data Transformation: Code Repository (leveraging PySpark for scalable transformations) and Data Pipeline Builder. Data Modeling: Ontology Manager (defining Objects, Links, and Properties). Analytics/Visualization: Contour (workflow creation and reporting). Application Building: Workshop and/or Slate (for custom operational applications). Advanced Capabilities: Experience integrating or utilizing Palantir AIP (Artificial Intelligence Platform). Front\-End Skills: Familiarity with basic JavaScript, HTML, and CSS for advanced customization of applications within Slate and Workshop Additional Information: Experience with Big Data architectures and concepts (e.g., Spark). Familiarity with Cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP). Experience working in an Agile environment (Scrum/Kanban/SAFe). Knowledge of the Aviation/Aerospace industry (MRO, Flight Operations, Manufacturing\&Engineering).


  

15 years full time education

Applies testing methodologies, principles and processes to define and implement key metrics to manage and assess the testing process including test execution and defect resolution.

**Good to have skills :** NA  

Minimum **5** year(s) of experience is required

Your typical day will involve collaborating with teams to develop innovative solutions and ensure seamless application functionality. Roles \& Responsibilities: \- Expected to be an SME \- Collaborate and manage the team to perform \- Responsible for team decisions \- Engage with multiple teams and contribute on key decisions \- Provide solutions to problems for their immediate team and across multiple teams \- Lead the application development process \- Implement best practices for application design and development \- Conduct code reviews and ensure code quality standards are met Professional \& Technical Skills: \- Must To Have Skills: Proficiency in Microsoft Azure Data Services, ADF, ADB, Pyspark \- Hands on experience in Azure Data Lake Storage (ADLS Gen2\), Azure SQL / SQL DW, Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Functions \- Proficiency in SQL (T\-SQL, PL/SQL) for querying, data manipulation, and optimization. \- Knowledge of Azure SQL Database and Azure Cosmos DB \- Proficiency with Python or Scala for scripting and data transformation. Additional Information: \- The candidate should have a minimum of 5 years of experience in Microsoft Azure Data Services \- This position is based at our Pune office (Kharadi) and 3 days WFO mandatory \- A 15 years full\-time education is required

title: Senior Lead Engineer
description:
**Date Posted:**


2025\-12\-15**Country:**


India**Location:**


Phase\-II, 7th Floor, Block\-III, DLF Commercial Developer Ltd., Plot No. 129 to 132, APHB Colony, Gachibowli, Hyderabad, Telengana, India**Position Role Type:**


Unspecified**Job Overview**


We are seeking an Automation Tester with strong expertise in Python scripting, C\+\+ unit testing, code coverage analysis, and manual testing. The ideal candidate will design and execute automation frameworks, perform code coverage analysis, and ensure quality across web, backend, and mobile applications. Exposure to cybersecurity testing and mobile app testing will be a strong advantage.

**Preferred Skills**


Automation Tester – Python, C\+\+, Code Coverage, Manual Testing


 Location: Hyderabad \| Full\-Time \| Department: CA

**Key Responsibilities**

* Design, develop, and maintain automation test scripts using Python.
* Write and execute unit tests in C\+\+ to validate core modules.
* Perform code coverage analysis to ensure robust test coverage.
* Execute manual test cases for functional, regression, and integration testing.
* Collaborate with development teams to identify defects early and improve testability.
* Integrate automated tests within CI/CD pipelines.
* Document test strategies, plans, and results for traceability and compliance.
* Support web, backend, and mobile application testing efforts.
* Ensure adherence to quality engineering best practices.

**Required Skills \& Experience**

* 5–8 years of experience in software testing (automation \+ manual).
* Strong experience in Python scripting for automation frameworks.
* Hands\-on expertise in C\+\+ and unit testing in C\+\+ (e.g., using Google Test, CppUnit, or similar).
* Experience with code coverage tools and test reporting.
* Solid knowledge of manual testing methodologies and defect management.
* Familiarity with CI/CD tools (e.g., Azure DevOps, Jenkins, GitLab).
* Experience with version control systems like Git.
* Strong debugging, analytical, and problem\-solving skills.

**Nice to Have**

* Exposure to cybersecurity testing (vulnerabilities, secure coding validation).
* Experience in mobile app testing (Android/iOS).
* Knowledge of performance/load testing tools.
* Prior experience working in Agile/Scrum teams.

**Soft Skills**

* Strong attention to detail and quality mindset.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
* Ability to work independently and manage priorities.
* Proactive and eager to adopt new testing tools and practices.

**Collins Aerospace**


Collins Aerospace, a Raytheon Technologies company, is a leader in technologically advanced and intelligent solutions for the global aerospace and defense industry. Collins Aerospace has the capabilities, comprehensive portfolio and expertise to solve customers’ toughest challenges and to meet the demands of a rapidly evolving global market.

**Avionics:**


Our Avionics team advances aviation electronics and information management solutions for commercial and military customers across the world. That means we’re helping passengers reach their destination safely. We’re connecting aircraft operators, airports, rail and critical infrastructure with intelligent data service solutions that keep passengers, flight crews and militaries connected and informed. And we’re providing industry\-leading fire protection and safety systems that our customers can count on when it matters most. Are you ready to learn from the most knowledgeable experts in the industry, develop the technologies of tomorrow and reach new heights in your career? Join our Avionics team today.

**WE ARE REDEFINING AEROSPACE.**

* Please consider the following role type definitions as you apply for this role.

**Onsite:** Employees who are working in Onsite roles will work primarily onsite. This includes all production and maintenance employees, as they are essential to the development of our products.

**Hybrid:** Employees who are working in Hybrid roles will work regularly both onsite and offsite. Ratio of time working onsite will be determined in partnership with your leader.

**Remote:** Employees who are working in Remote roles will work primarily offsite (from home). An employee may be expected to travel to the site location as needed.

*Regardless of your role type, collaboration and innovation are critical to our business and all employees will have access to digital tools so they can work with colleagues around the world – and access to Collins sites when their work requires in\-person meetings.*


Some of our competitive benefits package includes:

**Benefits package includes:**

* Meal coupons
* Group Term Life Insurance.
* Group Health Insurance.
* Group Personal Accident Insurance.
* Entitled for 18 days of vacation and 12 days of contingency leave annually.
* Employee scholar programme.
* Work life balance.
* Car lease programme.
* National Pension Scheme
* LTA
* Fuel \& Maintenance /Driver wages


Nothing matters more to Collins Aerospace than our strong ethical and safety commitments. As such, all India positions require a background check, which may include a drug screen.


Note:

* Background check and drug screen required (every external new hire in the India)
* Drug Screen only performed for Operations Positions


At Collins, the paths we pave together lead to limitless possibility. And the bonds we form – with our customers and with each other \- propel us all higher, again and again.

  



Apply now and be part of the team that’s redefining aerospace, every day

*RTX adheres to the principles of equal employment. All qualified applications will be given careful consideration without regard to ethnicity, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation or identity, national origin, age, disability, protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by law.*


**Privacy Policy and Terms:**


Click on this link to read the Policy and Terms
company_description: Collins Aerospace, an RTX business, is a leader in technologically advanced and intelligent solutions for the global aerospace and defense industry.

* Entitled for 18 days of vacation and 12 days of contingency leave annually.
* Employee scholar programme.
* Work life balance.
* Car lease programme.
* National Pension Scheme
* LTA
* Fuel \& Maintenance /Driver wages


Nothing matters more to Collins Aerospace than our strong ethical and safety commitments. As such, all India positions require a background check, which may include a drug screen.


Note:

* Background check and drug screen required (every external new hire in the India)

At Collins, the paths we pave together lead to limitless possibility. And the bonds we form – with our customers and with each other \- propel us all higher, again and again.

  



Apply now and be part of the team that’s redefining aerospace, every day
