title: Buisness Analyst
description:
We are looking for a **dynamic and organized individual** who can manage client communication, prepare presentations, visualize project wireframes, and coordinate effectively between clients and the development team.  
This role requires strong communication skills, attention to detail, and the ability to translate client requirements into clear visual and actionable formats.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Act as the **primary point of contact** between clients and the internal development/design teams.
* Create and present **PowerPoint/Canva presentations** showcasing project ideas, website structures, and mobile app layouts (rough wireframes).
* Conduct regular **client meetings and follow\-ups** to ensure clear communication and project progress tracking.
* Coordinate project milestones, deliverables, and feedback with designers, developers, and QA teams.
* Perform **manual testing** of web and mobile applications once or twice a month to identify issues or usability improvements.
* Prepare **bug reports** and share them with the development team for resolution.
* Maintain project documentation, client feedback records, and task tracking sheets using **MS Excel**.
* Ensure timely updates and smooth communication between all stakeholders.

**Required Skills \& Qualifications:**

* Excellent **verbal and written communication skills** in English.
* Strong presentation skills with hands\-on experience in **Microsoft PowerPoint** and **Canva**.
* Proficiency in **MS Excel** for data organization and project tracking.
* Ability to understand basic **web and mobile app structures**, user flows, and UI/UX concepts.
* Good analytical and coordination skills with a proactive approach.
* Prior experience in **client handling, coordination, or project assistance** will be a plus.

**Nice to Have:**

* Basic understanding of design tools (like Figma, Adobe XD, or Canva).
* Background in IT, digital marketing, or software services domain.

Full\-time \| On\-site

title: UI/UX Designer
description:
Job Profile Status: Currently hiring for this position.


**About NexGi:**
----------------



NexGi is a growth\-focused digital solutions company empowering brands to scale through performance\-driven marketing, cutting\-edge technology, and innovative strategies. We work with clients across industries, helping them thrive in the ever\-evolving digital ecosystem through impactful, data\-backed campaigns and full\-funnel marketing execution.


**Role Overview:**
------------------



We are looking for an innovative UI/UX Designer to join our growing digital team. In this role, you will be responsible for crafting seamless and visually stunning user experiences across both mobile applications and websites. You must be an expert in Figma, using it as your primary playground to build intuitive, high\-fidelity designs. Crucially, we are looking for a forward\-thinking designer who is proficient with modern AI tools (such as Midjourney, Relume, Uizard, or Figma AI plugins) to accelerate workflows, generate assets, and innovate design processes. You will collaborate closely with our tech team and clients to turn conceptual ideas into polished, high\-performing digital products.


**Key Responsibilities:**
-------------------------


* Translate complex product requirements and user needs into intuitive, elegant, and user\-friendly designs for mobile and web applications.
* Create wireframes, user flows, interactive prototypes, and high\-fidelity mockups Figma.
* Design visually stunning, responsive, and conversion\-optimized landing pages and marketing websites.
* Develop and maintain a comprehensive design system and style guide to ensure visual consistency across all the projects and brand assets.
* Conduct user research, interviews, and usability testing to gather insights and validate design decisions.
* Collaborate closely with product managers, back\-end, and front\-end engineers to ensure seamless design implementation and a cohesive user experience.
* Iterate on designs based on user feedback, data analytics, and A/B testing results.
* Champion a user\-centered design culture within the company.

**What We’re Looking For:**
---------------------------


* 1\-3 years of professional experience as a UI/UX Designer.
* A strong portfolio showcasing expertise in Mobile App and Website UI design. (Portfolio is mandatory).
* Expert proficiency in Figma is a must.
* Familiarity with Generative AI tools for design (e.g., image generation, layout acceleration, or AI\-driven prototyping).
* Solid understanding of user\-centered design principles, information architecture, interaction design, and visual design.
* Proven ability to design responsive landing pages with a focus on conversion rate optimization (CRO).
* Ability to translate complex functionalities into simple and intuitive user interfaces.
* Excellent communication skills to clearly articulate your design decisions and collaborate effectively with a technical team.

**Perks \& Benefits**
---------------------


* Direct Mentorship: Direct access to experienced leadership and founders.
* Hands\-on Experience: Opportunity to work on live mobile and web projects from day one.
* Tech\-Forward Culture: Access to the latest tools and platforms, including premium AI design tools.
* Career Growth: Pathways tailored to high performers with opportunities to lead design projects.
* Collaborative Environment: Flat team structure with room to explore content, strategy, and business development.
* Performance Incentives: Competitive salary with performance\-based bonuses.

If you’re excited about digital marketing and want to work in a team that values creativity, learning, and performance, we’d love to hear from you.

  


Meet our people


**SMART**
**PROACTIVE**
**RELIABLE**
------------------------------------



At NexGen, every individual is having a skill to thrive perfection. We are a team of designers, developers, engineers, marketers and most importantly we are NexGen Innovators.

title: Senior AI Python Developer
description:
**Job Title: Python Developer (Backend \+ AI/ML)**  
**Experience: 5\-6 yrs**

**Location: Mohali**

We are seeking an experienced Python Developer with 5\-6 years of expertise in backend development and AI/ML. The ideal candidate will design and maintain scalable backend solutions, RESTful APIs, and data pipelines while optimizing performance and security. The role also involves building, training, and deploying AI/ML models, Retrieval\-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipelines, and integrating with vector databases and LLM frameworks.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Design, develop, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable Python code.
* Build scalable backend solutions and lightweight APIs for ML/LLM\-driven applications.
* Develop, train, and fine\-tune AI/ML models for production use cases.
* Implement MLOps pipelines for model training, evaluation, deployment, and monitoring.
* Work with RAG pipelines, embeddings, and vector databases (ChromaDB, FAISS, Pinecone, Milvus, Weaviate, etc.).
* Integrate LLM frameworks (LangChain, LlamaIndex, etc.) and external APIs (e.g., OpenAI APIs).
* Collaborate with AI/ML engineers to transform prototypes into production\-ready solutions.
* Optimize AI/ML workflows for performance, scalability, and security.
* Work with relational (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL databases (MongoDB, Redis).
* Conduct experiments, analyze large datasets, and derive insights for product improvements.
* Implement best practices for coding, code reviews, and testing.
* Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade backend services and deployed ML models.
* Stay up to date with industry trends in AI/ML, LLMs, and backend systems.

**Required Skills \& Qualifications:**

* 5\-6 years of professional experience in Python development and AI/ML.
* Strong knowledge of ML frameworks: TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit\-learn.
* Hands\-on experience with model training, fine\-tuning, and deployment.
* Basic knowledge of backend frameworks (Flask, FastAPI, or Django – not mandatory).
* Experience in RAG pipelines and vector databases (ChromaDB, FAISS, Pinecone, Weaviate, Milvus).
* Experience with LangChain, OpenAI APIs, and LLM\-based workflows.
* Experience with relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB, Redis).
* Proficiency in RESTful API development.
* Experience with cloud AI platforms (AWS SageMaker, Azure ML, GCP AI Platform).
* Familiarity with containerization (Docker) and orchestration (Kubernetes).
* Experience with version control systems (Git/GitHub/GitLab).
* Strong problem\-solving skills, analytical mindset, and ability to work in cross\-functional teams.

**About the company:**

Geek Tech provides a full suite of digital marketing, web/mobile app design, development solutions, and services to elevate brands. Our firm commitment to client profitability and long\-term client relationships has helped our agency grow steadily since our inception in the market.

www.geekinformatic.com

title: Magento Developer
description:
**Location:** Mira Road, Mumbai (On\-site)  
**Experience:** 3 to 5 Years  
**Joining:** Immediate Joiner Preferred  
**Job Type:** Full\-time

**Job Description:**

We are looking for a dynamic and skilled **Magento Developer with additional experience in Flutter** to join our team on\-site at Mira Road. The ideal candidate should have hands\-on experience in Magento 2 eCommerce development and should also be capable of working with **Flutter** to support mobile app development and integration.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Develop and maintain eCommerce websites using **Magento 2**.
* Customize themes, develop custom modules, and maintain Magento extensions.
* Build, test, and deploy mobile applications using **Flutter (iOS \& Android)**.
* Integrate Magento with Flutter\-based mobile apps via APIs.
* Troubleshoot and resolve Magento and Flutter\-related bugs or performance issues.
* Collaborate with designers, backend developers, and project managers for seamless project delivery.
* Perform code reviews, optimizations, and ensure high standards of quality and performance.
* Implement third\-party tools and payment gateway integrations.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

* 3–5 years of experience in **Magento 2 development**.
* At least **1 year of hands\-on experience with Flutter** (Dart).
* Strong understanding of **PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery**.
* Experience with Magento theming, module development, and customizations,Dashboard management.
* Strong knowledge of **RESTful APIs**, especially integrating with mobile apps.
* Familiarity with version control tools like **Git**.
* Solid understanding of responsive design, MVC, and object\-oriented programming.
* Ability to troubleshoot and debug both Magento and Flutter applications.

**Nice to Have:**

* Magento 2 certification.
* Experience with Firebase, Push Notifications, and mobile performance tuning.
* Knowledge of deploying apps to Play Store and App Store.
* Previous experience in an eCommerce or tech agency environment.

**Soft Skills:**

* Good communication and teamwork skills.
* Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
* Strong problem\-solving mindset and attention to detail.

Job Type: Full\-time

Pay: ₹500,000\.00 \- ₹600,000\.00 per year

Application Question(s):

* How many total years of experience do you have in Magento 2 development?
* How much hands\-on experience do you have with Flutter (Dart)?
* Are you comfortable working on\-site at Mira Road, Mumbai?

\*   
Do you have experience developing custom modules or only theme\-level customizations?

* Have you worked on Magento 2 APIs or integrated third\-party services?
* Are you familiar with Magento\-API integration for mobile apps?
* Are you comfortable with PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery?
* Which version control tools have you used? (e.g., Git, Bitbucket)
* Have you integrate a Flutter app with a Magento backend?

title: React Native Developer
description:
Job description:

**React Native Developer**

* **Location:** Remote
* **Experience:** 3\+ Years
* **Employment Type:** Full\-Time

**Key Responsibilities**

* Develop and maintain high\-quality mobile applications for Android and iOS using React Native.
* Translate UI/UX wireframes into responsive, functional, and optimized mobile components.
* Integrate third\-party APIs and ensure smooth data synchronization.
* Optimize performance, debug issues, and manage app updates and store releases.
* Work with native modules (Android/iOS) when required.
* Collaborate with cross\-functional teams — designers, backend developers, and QA engineers.
* Maintain clean, reusable, and well\-documented code.
* Stay updated with the latest React Native and mobile development trends.

**Required Skills \& Experience**

* 4–5 years of hands\-on experience in mobile app development.
* 3\+ years of strong experience in React Native.
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or equivalent practical experience.
* Proficiency in JavaScript (ES6\+) and TypeScript.
* Experience with Redux or Context API for state management.
* Knowledge of RESTful APIs, AsyncStorage, and app data handling.
* Familiarity with Android Studio, Xcode, and CI/CD tools.
* Understanding of app deployment (Google Play Store / Apple App Store).
* Experience with Git version control and testing frameworks (Jest, Mocha, etc.).
* Strong debugging and problem\-solving skills.

**Preferred Skills (Good to Have)**

* Experience integrating native modules (Java/Kotlin, Swift/Objective\-C).
* Knowledge of backend technologies like Node.js or GraphQL.
* Familiarity with tools like Crashlytics, Firebase, or Sentry.
* Exposure to Agile/Scrum methodologies.

Job Types: Full\-time, Permanent

Work Location: Remote

title: Junior Flutter Developer
description:
**Job description:**

We are looking for a passionate **Junior Flutter Developer** to join our growing team. You will be responsible for building and maintaining mobile applications while working closely with cross\-functional teams to deliver high\-quality, user\-friendly apps. This is an excellent opportunity for someone eager to grow their career in mobile development.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Develop and maintain mobile applications using Flutter and Dart.
* Collaborate with designers, project managers, and developers to define and implement new features.
* Ensure app performance, quality, and responsiveness.
* Debug and fix issues, as well as identify performance bottlenecks.
* Write clean, maintainable, and reusable code.
* Participate in code reviews and contribute to improving coding standards.
* Stay updated with emerging technologies to improve development efficiency.

**Requirements**

* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
* Some experience in Flutter development (internships, projects, or prior roles).
* Strong knowledge of Dart and familiarity with RESTful APIs.
* Basic understanding of mobile app development lifecycle.
* Familiarity with Git or other version control tools.
* Knowledge of UI/UX principles for mobile applications.
* Good problem\-solving skills and keen attention to detail.
* Strong communication and teamwork abilities.

**Preferred Qualifications**

* Exposure to native Android or iOS development.
* Familiarity with push notifications and cloud messaging APIs.
* Understanding of Agile methodologies.

Job Type: Full\-time

Work Location: In person

title: React Native Developer
description:
**Job Title: Senior React Native Developer / Mobile App Developer**

**Location:** Noida (Sector 63\)  
**Mode:** Full\-time (Hybrid/Onsite)  
**Experience:** 1 \- 3 years  
**Company:** Probey Services Pvt. Ltd.

**About the Role**

We’re looking for a **hands\-on Senior Developer** who has actually built and deployed apps on the Play Store and App Store. Someone who can take ownership of features, build clean and scalable modules, and guide our junior team whenever needed without moving away from actual development.

**What You’ll Be Doing**

**Build high\-quality mobile apps** using React Native (core coding \+ feature development).

Work on **React \+ Redux** for dashboards, web modules, and client platforms.

Develop and maintain **Node.js APIs** and backend logic.

Handle **end\-to\-end deployments** on Play Store and App Store (builds, signing, releases, certificates).

Work with **databases** (MongoDB/MySQL/Firebase) for stable, scalable data flow.

Manage **server setups** and deployments on AWS/Firebase when needed.

Debug, test, and ensure smooth performance across devices.

Collaborate daily with designers, PMs, QA, and junior developers.

Follow strong workflows using **Git, JIRA, CI/CD** and maintain code discipline.

**What You Need to Bring**

Strong skills in **React Native, React, Redux, Node.js, JavaScript/TypeScript**

Experience publishing apps on **Play Store / App Store**

Understanding of **API integration, backend workflows, cloud hosting, and version control**

Ability to support and guide fresher team members, while staying deeply involved in coding

Solid problem\-solving, debugging, and architecture thinking

**Must\-Have**

· 1 \- 3 years of real\-world experience

· At least 2**\+ live apps** deployed

· Hands\-on, ownership mindset

· Comfortable working in a hybrid setup

**Why Join Us**

· Work on real products, used by real users

· Independence \+ responsibility

· A fast\-paced, young team

· Clear growth path to **Lead Developer / Tech Lead**

Job Types: Full\-time, Permanent, Contractual / Temporary, Volunteer  
Contract length: 3 months

Pay: ₹18,000\.52 \- ₹30,000\.48 per month

Benefits:

* Cell phone reimbursement
* Commuter assistance
* Flexible schedule
* Health insurance
* Internet reimbursement
* Leave encashment
* Paid sick time
* Paid time off
* Provident Fund

Work Location: In person

title: Senior Data Analyst (AI/ML)
description:
**Company Description**  

Eurofins Scientific is an international life sciences company, providing a unique range of analytical testing services to clients across multiple industries, to make life and the environment safer, healthier and more sustainable. From the food you eat to the medicines you rely on, Eurofins works with the biggest companies in the world to ensure the products they supply are safe, their ingredients are authentic and labelling is accurate. Eurofins is a global leader in food, environmental, pharmaceutical and cosmetic product testing and in agroscience CRO services. It is also one of the global independent market leaders in certain testing and laboratory services for genomics, discovery pharmacology, forensics, CDMO, advanced material sciences and in the support of clinical studies.


In over just 35 years, Eurofins has grown from one laboratory in Nantes, France to 62,000 staff across a network of over 1,000 independent companies in 61 countries, operating 900 laboratories. Performing over 450 million tests every year, Eurofins offers a portfolio of over 200,000 analytical methods to evaluate the safety, identity, composition, authenticity, origin, traceability and purity of biological substances and products, as well as providing innovative clinical diagnostic testing services, as one of the leading global emerging players in specialised clinical diagnostics testing.


Eurofins is one of the fastest growing listed European companies with a listing on the French stock exchange since 1997\.


Eurofins IT Solutions India Pvt Ltd (EITSI) is a fully owned subsidiary of Eurofins and functions as a Global Software Delivery Center exclusively catering to Eurofins Global IT business needs. The code shipped out of EITSI impacts the global network of Eurofins labs and services.


The primary focus at EITSI is to develop the next generation LIMS (Lab Information Management system), Customer portals, e\-commerce solutions, ERP/CRM system, Mobile Apps \& other B2B platforms for various Eurofins Laboratories and businesses. Young and dynamic, we have a rich culture and we offer fulfilling careers.

 **Job Description** **Senior Software Engineer – Data, AI \& BI / Full Stack**  

**Experience: 4–7 Years**  

**Type: Full\-time**  

  

**Overall Objective**  

Contribute to transforming Eurofins’ analytics and AI capabilities by building scalable data engineering, BI, and AI\-driven solutions on Azure. Help design and deliver intelligent automation and insights within existing business systems through seamless API and service integrations.  

  

**Roles \& Responsibilities**

* Design and develop end\-to\-end data pipelines (ingestion, modeling, governance, visualization).
* Implement Azure\-based analytics solutions using Azure Data Lake, Synapse, Fabric, Key Vault, etc.
* Build and optimize Power BI dashboards, semantic models, and curated datasets.
* Integrate AI/ML capabilities into existing business applications and workflows to enhance business processes.
* Develop solutions using Python, C\#, and data processing frameworks for scalable computation.
* Integrate AI models and services (Azure OpenAI / Azure ML / external APIs) into existing applications and services.
* Work on API\-first and microservices architecture with Azure Functions, Web APIs, and service orchestration.
* Support MLOps pipelines, model deployment, testing, and monitoring.
* Participate in Agile delivery, design discussions, architectural improvements, and code reviews.

  

**Required Skills**

* Strong SQL skills including optimization and performance tuning.
* Hands\-on experience with Azure cloud ecosystem (Azure Data Lake, Synapse, Azure ML, Functions, Key Vault, Fabric).
* Strong experience designing dashboards and BI solutions using Power BI.
* Programming experience in Python and C\# (.NET Core).
* Exposure to AI, ML, GenAI, and ability to integrate AI models into solutions via APIs.
* Strong understanding of data warehousing, semantic modeling, and enterprise reporting.

  

**Good to Have**

* Experience with vector search and embeddings.
* Experience with conversational AI / RAG / AI copilots.
* Experience in regulated industries (Life Sciences / Healthcare).

  

**Personal Attributes**

* Strong analytical and problem\-solving skills.
* Ability to collaborate and communicate effectively.
* Passion for innovation, learning, and cloud\-native engineering.

  

**Additional Information** **Personal Skills:**

* Excellent analytical and problem solving skills
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills
* Ability to articulate and present different points\-of\-views on various topics related to project and otherwise.
* Eager to learn and continuously develop personal and technical capabilities.

**Required Qualifications:**

* MCA or Bachelors in Engineering, Computer Science or equivalent.

**PERFORMANCE APPRAISAL CRITERIA**: Eurofins has a strong focus on Performance Management system. This includes quarterly calibrations, half\-yearly reviews and annual reviews. The KPIs shall be set and may vary slightly between projects. These will be clearly communicated, documented during the first 30 days of your joining.

title: Data Analyst Trainee
description:
**Launch Your Career in Data Analytics!**

Do you have a knack for working with numbers, patterns, and insights?  
We are offering an opportunity for freshers and IT\-background students to kickstart their career as a **Data Analyst Trainee**.

In this role, you’ll gain hands\-on experience in **data collection, processing, visualization, and reporting**, working with real\-time datasets and industry\-standard tools.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Work with datasets to clean, organize, and analyze data
* Create reports and dashboards using tools like **Excel, Power BI, or Tableau**
* Assist in identifying trends and patterns to support business decisions
* Write SQL queries to extract and manipulate data
* Collaborate with the analytics team for project deliverables

**Who Can Apply:**

* Students or graduates in BTech, BSc, BCA, MCA, MTech (preferably IT, CS, or related fields)
* Freshers passionate about a career in data analytics or data science
* Candidates with basic knowledge of Excel, SQL, or Python will have an advantage

**What You’ll Gain:**

✅ Hands\-on training in data analysis tools and techniques  
✅ Internship Certificate upon completion  
✅ 100% Placement Assistance  
✅ Exposure to real\-time analytics projects  
✅ Mentoring from experienced industry professionals

**About Us:**  
Camerin Edutech, based in Carnival Infopark Kakkanad, is Kerala’s leading IT training and development institute. We have successfully helped 8000\+ students start their tech careers with practical skill\-building and job placement support.

Pay: ₹10,000\.00 \- ₹15,000\.00 per month

title: Data Analyst
description:

title: Technical Analyst (AI and CyberSecurity)
description:
**Job Overview**

We are seeking a motivated and detail\-oriented Junior Risk Management Analyst to join our cybersecurity consulting team in Jaipur, Rajasthan. The Junior Risk Management Analyst will support the development of risk assessments, compliance documentation, client proposals, and presentation materials related to cybersecurity and information security management. This role requires a candidate with strong writing skills, proficiency in creating professional presentations, and the ability to understand and communicate complex cybersecurity concepts. The ideal candidate will have a passion for cybersecurity, excellent documentation skills, and the ability to work collaboratively in a fast\-paced consulting environment.

**Note: This position is open exclusively to female candidates residing in Rajasthan.**

**Key Responsibilities**

* **Presentation Development:** Create comprehensive PowerPoint presentations on cybersecurity topics including risk management, compliance frameworks, threat intelligence, security controls, and industry best practices with professional design and clear visual communication.
* **Proposal and Response Writing:** Develop detailed responses to client RFIs (Request for Information) and RFPs (Request for Proposal) including technical requirements, solution descriptions, project methodologies, timelines, and deliverables for cybersecurity services.
* **Risk Assessment Documentation:** Assist in preparing risk assessment reports, threat analysis documents, vulnerability summaries, and risk treatment plans for clients across various industries and compliance requirements.
* **Graphical Design and Infographics:** Design visual content including infographics, process diagrams, architecture diagrams, compliance matrices, and data visualization charts to effectively communicate cybersecurity concepts and findings.
* **Technical Documentation:** Create and maintain technical documentation including security policies, procedures, guidelines, standard operating procedures (SOPs), runbooks, and compliance frameworks aligned with ISO 27001 or NIST standards.
* **Research and Content Development:** Conduct research on emerging cybersecurity threats, industry trends, regulatory changes, and best practices to support proposal development, client presentations, and advisory services.
* **Compliance Framework Documentation:** Assist in developing documentation for compliance frameworks including gap assessment reports, remediation plans, control implementation guides, and audit preparation materials.
* **Client Communication Support:** Prepare executive summaries, status reports, meeting minutes, and client\-facing documentation ensuring clarity, accuracy, and professional presentation quality.
* **Quality Assurance:** Review and proofread technical documents, presentations, and proposals for accuracy, consistency, formatting standards, and alignment with brand guidelines before client delivery.
* **Template Development:** Create and maintain reusable templates for proposals, presentations, risk assessments, reports, and other documentation to improve efficiency and consistency across deliverables.
* **Collaboration and Coordination:** Work closely with senior analysts, cybersecurity consultants, project managers, and technical teams to gather information, understand client requirements, and deliver high\-quality documentation on schedule.

**Qualifications**

**Experience**

1–2 years of professional experience in IT, technical writing, documentation, content development, or related roles with exposure to cybersecurity, risk management, or technology consulting preferred.

**Preferred Background**

* Experience in IT operations, helpdesk, system administration, or technology support roles
* Background in technical writing, documentation management, or content creation
* Familiarity with cybersecurity concepts, frameworks, or compliance standards
* Experience creating client presentations, proposals, or business documentation
* Knowledge of information security principles and risk management methodologies

**Education**

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Computer Applications (BCA), Business Administration, Mass Communication, English, or related field. Three\-year degree programs are acceptable.

**Technical Skills**

* Advanced proficiency in Microsoft PowerPoint including slide design, animations, transitions, SmartArt graphics, and professional template creation
* Strong expertise in Microsoft Word for technical documentation, formatting, styles, tables, and professional report creation
* Proficiency in Microsoft Excel for data organization, analysis, tables, charts, and basic formulas
* Experience with graphic design tools such as Canva, Adobe Illustrator, or similar platforms for creating infographics and visual content
* Familiarity with diagramming tools like Microsoft Visio, Lucidchart, or Draw.io for process flows and architecture diagrams
* Basic understanding of cybersecurity terminology, risk management concepts, and compliance frameworks
* Strong research skills using online resources, industry publications, and technical documentation
* Excellent English language proficiency with strong grammar, vocabulary, and technical writing capabilities
* Attention to detail with ability to format documents according to brand guidelines and quality standards

**Soft Skills**

* Excellent written and verbal communication skills with ability to explain technical concepts in clear, accessible language
* Strong organizational skills with ability to manage multiple documentation projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines
* Detail\-oriented mindset ensuring accuracy, consistency, and quality in all deliverables
* Self\-motivated and proactive with ability to work independently and seek clarification when needed
* Collaborative team player with willingness to support colleagues and contribute to team success
* Adaptability to learn new cybersecurity concepts, tools, and documentation requirements quickly
* Professional attitude with commitment to maintaining confidentiality of sensitive client information

**Additional Requirements**

* Strong interest in cybersecurity, risk management, and information security domains with willingness to develop expertise
* Ability to understand and interpret technical requirements, security frameworks, and compliance standards
* Willingness to learn about emerging cybersecurity threats, technologies, and industry best practices
* Flexibility to accommodate occasional deadline\-driven work schedules during proposal submissions or client deliverables
* Commitment to continuous improvement in technical writing, presentation design, and cybersecurity knowledge
* Professional demeanor for potential client interactions and presentation support
* Must be a female candidate currently residing in Rajasthan

**Work Environment**

This is an on\-site position based in Jaipur, Rajasthan. The role operates in a collaborative consulting environment with regular interaction with senior analysts, technical teams, and project managers. Work involves primarily office\-based documentation and presentation development with occasional participation in client meetings and briefings.

**Resume Information**

**How to Apply**

To apply for this position, email your resume to job2026@thefourthcommand.com in pdf format only.

**Subject Line Format:** FC\_06\_\[YOUR FULL NAME]\_RESUME

**Resume Requirements**

Your resume must include the following information:

* **Last Company Details:** Name of your most recent employer with the number of years of work experience at that organization, your job title, and brief description of your responsibilities
* **Technical Writing Experience:** Details of any technical documentation, content creation, or writing projects you have completed including types of documents, tools used, and audience
* **IT Experience:** If applicable, describe your IT background including technologies worked with, support provided, or technical skills developed
* **Software Proficiency:** List of Microsoft Office applications and design tools you are proficient in with your skill level for each
* **Educational Background:** Complete educational qualifications including degree name, specialization, institution, and year of completion
* **Certifications:** Any relevant certifications in technical writing, Microsoft Office, graphic design, or cybersecurity awareness training
* **Portfolio or Work Samples:** Links or attachments showcasing PowerPoint presentations, documents, infographics, or other content you have created (if available)
* **Passport Size Photograph:** A recent passport size photograph must be included on your resume (mandatory requirement)

**Additional Document Required**

**Aadhar Card:** A clear scanned copy or photograph of your Aadhar Card (both sides) must be attached separately with your resume submission. This is a mandatory requirement for application consideration.

Incomplete applications or resumes missing any of the above requirements will not be considered for evaluation.

Job Type: Full\-time

Pay: ₹300,000\.00 \- ₹500,000\.00 per year

Work Location: In person

title: Data Transformation Analyst
description:
**About the Role:**  

**Grade Level (for internal use):** 08
  
  

**The Team:**  

The position is in Custom Geography team of North America Data Operations. Custom Geography team fits in the enhancement layer of Global Data Operations. This team is responsible for creating/maintaining geographical elements to provide the best information about the hierarchy, territory and geo\-boundaries for all our customers (OEM’s, Financial companies, Media companies etc).
  
We work with our customers to ensure that standard geographies are assigned to a custom level defined by the customer.
  
“Custom” Geography is a service we offer to our customers. It is the customization of geography, based on standard geography. Standard geographies are the State, County, Census Tract, Zip, DMA, etc….. boundaries. We manage monthly changes that are received.
  
**Team members resides globally:** 2 in India and 1 in US for now. This position will be an addition to India location.
  
  

**Responsibilities and Impact:**  

**Dealers buy reports to assist in sales tracking and patterns:** Market Area Reports, Cross Sell Reports, Polk Insight, Mapping (adhoc jobs/Polk Insight), Loyalty reporting.
  
Customers utilize Polk reports to monitor dealer performance, track organizational totals based on custom geography (Regions, Districts, Zone, Dealers)
  
**We support (3\) types of geography:** Frozen zip code (constant for at least one year), Census tract (constant for at least 10 years), UDB (Universal Database) tract/zip (Methodology utilizing reporting at 2 levels).
  
  

Understand the overall process and customer needs
  
  

Understand data within tables, workflows along with business rules
  
  

Monitor and maintain relevant data files processing along with its onboarding.
  
  

Follow guidelines and proactively raise alerts on functional/application/data risk.
  
  

Understand deliverables and their impact.
  
  

Communicate with Internal/External clients timely to ensure data files are processed as expected.
  
  

Create New Audits and support existing to mitigate anomalies.
  
  

Propose improvements
  
  

**What We’re Looking For :****Required Skills:**  

Bachelor’s degree
  
  

2\-3 years of work experience within Data information/Data Management field.
  
  

Good Communication skills and time management
  
  

Knowledge of SQL
  
  

Proficient in use of MS office applications
  
  

Exceptional customer relationship skills
  
  

Ability to perform root cause analysis
  
  

Organized and able to collaborate; work well in a team
  
  

We seek team members who enjoy collaboration, critical thinking, problem\-solving, and are resourceful with creative solutions.
  
  

About S\&P Global Mobility
  
At S\&P Global Mobility, we provide invaluable insights derived from unmatched automotive data, enabling our customers to anticipate change and make decisions with conviction. Our expertise helps them to optimize their businesses, reach the right consumers, and shape the future of mobility. We open the door to automotive innovation, revealing the buying patterns of today and helping customers plan for the emerging technologies of tomorrow.
  
For more information, visit www.spglobal.com/mobility .
  
  

What’s In It For You?
  
  

**Our Mission:**  

Advancing Essential Intelligence.
  
  

**Our People:**  

We're more than 35,000 strong worldwide—so we're able to understand nuances while having a broad perspective. Our team is driven by curiosity and a shared belief that Essential Intelligence can help build a more prosperous future for us all.From finding new ways to measure sustainability to analyzing energy transition across the supply chain to building workflow solutions that make it easy to tap into insight and apply it. We are changing the way people see things and empowering them to make an impact on the world we live in. We’re committed to a more equitable future and to helping our customers find new, sustainable ways of doing business. Join us and help create the critical insights that truly make a difference.
  
  

**Our Values:**  

Integrity, Discovery, Partnership
  
  

Throughout our history, the world's leading organizations have relied on us for the Essential Intelligence they need to make confident decisions about the road ahead. We start with a foundation of integrity in all we do, bring a spirit of discovery to our work, and collaborate in close partnership with each other and our customers to achieve shared goals.
  
  

**Benefits:**  

We take care of you, so you can take care of business. We care about our people. That’s why we provide everything you—and your career—need to thrive at S\&P Global.
  
  

**Our benefits include:**  

**Health \& Wellness:** Health care coverage designed for the mind and body.
  
  

**Flexible Downtime:** Generous time off helps keep you energized for your time on.
  
  

**Continuous Learning:** Access a wealth of resources to grow your career and learn valuable new skills.
  
  

**Invest in Your Future:** Secure your financial future through competitive pay, retirement planning, a continuing education program with a company\-matched student loan contribution, and financial wellness programs.
  
  

**Family Friendly Perks:** It’s not just about you. S\&P Global has perks for your partners and little ones, too, with some best\-in class benefits for families.
  
  

**Beyond the Basics:** From retail discounts to referral incentive awards—small perks can make a big difference.
  
**For more information on benefits by country visit:** https://spgbenefits.com/benefit\-summaries
  
  

**Global Hiring and Opportunity at S\&P Global:**  

At S\&P Global, we are committed to fostering a connected and engaged workplace where all individuals have access to opportunities based on their skills, experience, and contributions. Our hiring practices emphasize fairness, transparency, and merit, ensuring that we attract and retain top talent. By valuing different perspectives and promoting a culture of respect and collaboration, we drive innovation and power global markets.
  
  

**Recruitment Fraud Alert:**  

If you receive an email from a spglobalind.com domain or any other regionally based domains, it is a scam and should be reported to reportfraud@spglobal.com . S\&P Global never requires any candidate to pay money for job applications, interviews, offer letters, “pre\-employment training” or for equipment/delivery of equipment. Stay informed and protect yourself from recruitment fraud by reviewing our guidelines, fraudulent domains, and how to report suspicious activity here .

S\&P Global is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race/ethnicity, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, marital status, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other status protected by law. Only electronic job submissions will be considered for employment.

title: SQL Analyst With Tableau
description:
Job Description  

Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Our core activities are safeguarding assets, lending money, making payments and accessing the capital markets on behalf of our clients.


Citi's Mission and Value Proposition explains what we do and Citi Leadership Standards explain how we do it. Our mission is to serve as a trusted partner to our clients by responsibly providing financial services that enable growth and economic progress. We strive to earn and maintain our clients and the publics trust by constantly adhering to the highest ethical standards and making a positive impact on the communities we serve. Our Leadership Standards is a common set of skills and expected behaviors that illustrate how our employees should work every day to be successful and strengthens our ability to execute against our strategic priorities.  

Diversity is a key business imperative and a source of strength at Citi. We serve clients from every walk of life, every background and every origin. Our goal is to have our workforce reflect this same diversity at all levels. Citi has made it a priority to foster a culture where the best people want to work, where individuals are promoted based on merit, where we value and demand respect for others and where opportunities to develop are widely available to all.  

The Operations MIS team focuses on creating reports, dashboards, and performance metrics to provide actionable insights for various business functions, including USPB WFM \& Customer Service and Wealth Ops MIS. They are responsible for building and maintaining datamarts, migrating legacy BI tools to modern platforms like Tableau, and automating data refreshes for dashboards. Projects include tracking ATM availability and performance, managing service tickets, and upgrading software for uninterrupted service. They aim to empower business stakeholders with accurate and timely information for strategic decision\-making. Their work also supports capacity planning and issue remediation efforts.


The Business Analytics Analyst is a developing professional role. Applies specialty area knowledge in monitoring, assessing, analyzing and/or evaluating processes and data. Identifies policy gaps and formulates policies. Interprets data and makes recommendations. Researches and interprets factual information. Identifies inconsistencies in data or results, defines business issues and formulates recommendations on policies, procedures or practices. Integrates established disciplinary knowledge within own specialty area with basic understanding of related industry practices. Good understanding of how the team interacts with others in accomplishing the objectives of the area. Develops working knowledge of industry practices and standards. Limited but direct impact on the business through the quality of the tasks/services provided. Impact of the job holder is restricted to own team.

  

In this role, you're expected to:  

* Gathers operational data from various cross functional stakeholders to examine past business performance
* Identifies data patterns \& trends, and provides insights to enhance business decision making capability in business planning, process improvement, solution assessment etc.
* Recommends actions for future developments \& strategic business opportunities, as well as enhancements to operational policies.
* May be involved in exploratory data analysis, confirmatory data analysis and/or qualitative analysis.
* Translate data into consumer or customer behavioral insights to drive targeting and segmentation strategies, and communicate clearly and effectively to business partners and senior leaders all findings
* Continuously improve processes and strategies by exploring and evaluating new data sources, tools, and capabilities
* Work closely with internal and external business partners in building, implementing, tracking and improving decision strategies
* Appropriately assess risk when business decisions are made, demonstrating particular consideration for the firm's reputation and safeguarding Citigroup, its clients and assets, by driving compliance with applicable laws, rules and regulations, adhering to Policy, applying sound ethical judgment regarding personal behavior, conduct and business practices, and escalating, managing and reporting control issues with transparency.


As a successful candidate, should ideally have the following skills and exposure:  

* Reporting \& Dashboard Development: Proficiency in developing reports, dashboards, and performance metrics using reporting tools and data visualization techniques. Ability to create clear and concise visualizations ( using Tableau ) of key data.
* Data Management \& SQL: Expertise in data management principles, SQL programming for data extraction and manipulation, and database management systems.
* Communication \& Stakeholder Management: Ability to effectively communicate technical information to non\-technical stakeholders and collaborate with business partners to understand reporting requirements.
* Automation \& Scripting: Experience with scripting languages (e.g., Python) and automation tools (e.g., SSIS) for automating report generation, data refreshes, and other routine tasks.
  

Education:  

* Bachelors/University degree or equivalent experience


Working at Citi is far more than just a job. A career with us means joining a family of more than 230,000 dedicated people from around the globe. At Citi, you’ll have the opportunity to grow your career, give back to your community and make a real impact.

title: People Data Standards Analyst - Data Migration
description:
**Job title: People Data Standards Analyst \- Data Migration**

* **Location: Hyderabad**

**About the job**


Sanofi is a global life sciences company committed to improving access to healthcare and supporting the people we serve throughout the continuum of care. From prevention to treatment, Sanofi transforms scientific innovation into healthcare solutions, in human vaccines, rare diseases, multiple sclerosis, oncology, immunology, infectious diseases, diabetes and cardiovascular solutions and consumer healthcare. More than 110,000 people in over 100 countries at Sanofi are dedicated to making a difference on patients’ daily life, wherever they live and enabling them to enjoy a healthier life. As a company with a global vision of drug development and a highly regarded corporate culture, Sanofi is recognized as one of the best pharmaceutical companies in the world and is pioneering the application of Artificial Intelligence (AI) with strong commitment to develop advanced data standards to increase reusability \& interoperability and thus accelerate impact on global health.


As a People Data Standards Analyst \- Data Migration, you shape our data usage and ensure the adherence to global standards and polices. With our goal to simplify and automate you will drive standardization and consistent data usage across the region. We are seeking a detail\-oriented and collaborative People Data Standards Analyst to join our Master Data Management (MDM) Regional team. This role is critical in ensuring data integrity, consistency, and quality across our people systems through effective data management, including the development and management of Enterprise Integration Builders (EIBs). At Sanofi, we are dedicated to transforming healthcare through innovation and technology. Our digital initiatives focus on enhancing operational efficiency, improving patient outcomes and delivering best in class workplace experiences. We are seeking a talented Master Data Management Analyst to join our team and support our mission.

**Main responsibilities:**

* M\&A Integration Support \- Support merger and acquisition projects by analyzing and harmonizing people data from acquired entities. Assess data quality and identify gaps in incoming organizational data. Develop integration plans that align with MDM standards and best practices. Ensure compliance with data governance policies during organizational transitions.
* Data Migration \& System Implementation \- Lead and execute data migration activities for people systems implementations and upgrades. Develop and implement data mapping strategies to ensure seamless transitions between systems. Validate data accuracy and completeness throughout migration processes. Create and maintain comprehensive documentation of migration procedures and outcomes. Collaborate with Digital and technical teams to troubleshoot and resolve migration issues related to data.
* EIB Development \& Management \- Design, develop, and maintain templates and Enterprise Integration Builders (EIBs) for data integration and transformation. Configure and optimize EIBs to ensure efficient data flow between systems. Troubleshoot and resolve EIB\-related issues to maintain data integrity. Monitor EIB performance and implement improvements as needed. Create and maintain documentation for EIB processes.
* Data Harmonization \& Standardization \- Analyze disparate data sources to identify inconsistencies and standardization opportunities. Ensure alignment on data standards, definitions, and business rules for people data. Partner with regional and global stakeholders to establish unified data standards.
* Knowledge Transfer \& Team Enablement \- Serve as a subject matter expert on data standards, MDM processes, and EIB development. Develop training materials and documentation to support team learning. Create templates, user\-friendly guides and reference materials for data standards implementation.

**About you:**

* **Experience:** 4 – 6 years of related experience in the pharmaceutical industry. Experience in pharmaceutical or healthcare industry. Familiarity with data quality tools and technologies. Understanding of global data privacy regulations (GDPR, etc.)
* Strong experience in developing and managing Enterprise Integration Builders (EIBs). Proven experience with data migration projects and system implementations. Strong understanding of Master Data Management (MDM) principles and practices. Proficiency in data analysis, mapping, and transformation techniques. Experience with Workday HCM systems and people data structures. Advanced Excel skills, experience with data analysis tools preferred.
* Demonstrated experience in EIB development and optimization. Experience supporting M\&A integration activities and data consolidation. Demonstrated ability to harmonize data across multiple systems and sources. Track record of successful data migration and implementation projects. Experience in creating and delivering training and knowledge transfer programs.
* Technical: Strong understanding of EIB architecture and best practices. Analytical Thinking: Ability to understand complex data relationships and identify harmonization requirements. Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills to explain technical concepts to diverse audiences. Collaboration: Strong team player who can work effectively across regional and functional boundaries. Problem\-Solving: Proactive approach to identifying and resolving data quality issues. Attention to Detail: Meticulous approach to data validation and quality assurance. Comfortable working in a dynamic environment with changing priorities. Deep understanding of data governance frameworks and compliance requirements
* **Education:** Bachelor’s or Masters in Life Sciences/Healthcare, Business Administration, Engineering or Information Technology.
* **Languages:** Verbal and written fluency in English

**Why choose us?**

* Bring the miracles of science to life alongside a supportive, future\-focused team.
* Discover endless opportunities to grow your talent and drive your career, whether it’s through a promotion or lateral move, at home or internationally.
* Enjoy a thoughtful, well\-crafted rewards package that recognizes your contribution and amplifies your impact.
* Take good care of yourself and your family, with a wide range of health and wellbeing benefits including high\-quality healthcare, prevention, and wellness programs and at least 14 weeks’ gender\-neutral parental leave.
* Opportunity to work in an international environment, collaborating with diverse business teams and vendors, working in a dynamic team, and fully empowered to propose and implement innovative ideas.

title: Analyst – Field Analytics
description:
**Job title** Analyst – Field Analytics

* **Hiring Manager** Team Lead, Field Analytics
* **Location** Hyderabad
* **% of travel expected** Travel required as per business need
* **Job type** Permanent and Full time

**About the job**


Go\-To\-Market Capabilities (GTMC) Hub is an internal Sanofi resource organization based in Hyderabad, India and is set up to centralize processes and activities to support Specialty Care, Vaccines, General Medicines, CHC, CMO, and R\&D, Data \& Digital functions. GTMC strives to be a strategic and functional partner for tactical deliveries to Medical, HEVA, and Commercial organizations in Sanofi globally.


At Sanofi, we leverage analytics and technology to improve decision\-making and optimize field sales performance. The Field Analytics team focuses on delivering actionable insights to enhance territory management, sales execution, and resource allocation. This role will support the team by creating dashboards, refreshing reports, and ensuring high\-quality analytics deliverables for field operations.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Refresh existing field sales reports and identify improvement opportunities in reporting and BI tools.
* Create dashboards to visualize KPIs and enable decision\-making for field leadership.
* Support territory optimization and sales force effectiveness initiatives through data analysis.
* Collaborate with cross\-functional teams (Insights \& Analytics, Marketing) to maintain consistency in methodologies.

**Processes**

* Delivery of projects in with quality and timeliness
* Quality check of the deliverables of self and peers
* Adhere to compliance procedures and internal/operational risk controls in accordance with all applicable standards
* Use latest tools/technologies/methodologies and partner with internal teams to continuously improve data quality and availability by building business processes that support global standardization

**Technical skills**

* Expert in Relational database technologies and concepts
* Hands\-on experience of using analytical tools like PowerBI, SQL, Snowflake, advanced Excel (including VBA), etc. (Python is good to have)
* Experience of developing, refreshing and managing dashboards
* Experience with pharmaceutical datasets (e.g. IQVIA, Symphony, Komodo, Veeva, Salesforce) preferable
* Understanding of pharmaceutical development, manufacturing, supply chain, sales and marketing functions is preferable

**About you**

* **Experience** 1\-3 years of relevant work experience, preferably with an understanding of principles, standards, and best practices of Pharma Commercial Analytics and Dashboard development.
* **Education** Bachelors or Masters degree in areas such as Information Science/Operations/Management/Statistics/Decision Sciences/Engineering/Life Sciences/ Business Analytics or related field.
* **Soft skills** Strong learning agility; Ability to manage ambiguous environments, and to adapt to changing needs of the business; Good interpersonal and communication skills; strong presentation skills is a must; Team player who is curious, dynamic, result oriented; Ability to operate effectively in an international matrix environment, with ability to work across time zones; Demonstrated leadership and management in driving innovation and automation leveraging advanced analytical techniques
* **Languages** Excellent English communication skills – written and spoken


Pursue progress, discover extraordinary! Better is out there. Better medications, better outcomes, better science. But progress doesn’t happen without people – people from different backgrounds, in different locations, doing different roles, all united by one thing a desire to make miracles happen. So, let’s be those people!


At Sanofi, we provide equal opportunities to all regardless of race, colour, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, or gender identity!


Watch our ALL IN video and check out our Diversity Equity and Inclusion actions at sanofi.com!

title: Supply Chain Operations Analyst
description:
**Skill required:** Plan \- Retail Forecasting \& Replenishment  

**Designation:** Supply Chain Operations Analyst  

**Qualifications:**Any Graduation
  

**Years of Experience:**3 to 5 years
  

**About Accenture**  

Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security.Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Technology and Operations services, and Accenture Song— all powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. Our 699,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities.Visit us at www.accenture.com
  

**What would you do?** The role is to support the buying team, ensuring that tasks are undertaken accurately to drive overall performance in the business unit. To implement promotion plans for the category, and support analysis of pricing. To respond to stakeholder queries/changes to product information and other actions. To input and deliver the promotional strategy for the category and support delivering accuracy in pricing.  

**What are we looking for?** Pricing and Promotions • Implement of Buyer/Merchandiser led to retail price changes, including checks, escalations \& approvals. Add promotion plan with relevant compliance checks, communication to digital and requests for approval • Implement promotion offers like 20% off, check the compliance and approvals with senior members of the team, request voucher code generation from the campaign team, request digital badging and approved promotions • Generate clearance report through canvassing and clearance data, sharing with buying and merchandising to review report and determine next steps Core Competencies • Comfortable with responding to requests from all levels of the organization • Good vermal and written communication • Ability to work effectively in a team environment Other Expectations • Helpful and proactive manner, with a service orientation • Drives issues to resolution • Good organisational skills with the ability to handle and prioritize multiple tasks simultaneously. • Good communication skills \& ability to interface with clients. • Good interpersonal and administrative skills • Experience: o 2\-4 years of experience in pricing and promotion management, or supply chain management o Proven experience in pricing and promotion, S\&OP processes within a fast\-paced, high\-volume environment
  

**Roles and Responsibilities:** •In this role you are required to do analysis and solving of lower\-complexity problems • Your day to day interaction is with peers within Accenture before updating supervisors • In this role you may have limited exposure with clients and/or Accenture management • You will be given moderate level instruction on daily work tasks and detailed instructions on new assignments • The decisions you make impact your own work and may impact the work of others • You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team, with a focused scope of work • Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts


  

Any Graduation

title: Quality Auditing Analyst
description:
**Skill required:** Trust \& Safety \- Quality Management  

**Designation:** Quality Auditing Analyst  

**Qualifications:**Any Graduation
  

**Years of Experience:**3 to 5 years
  

**About Accenture**  

Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security.Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Technology and Operations services, and Accenture Song— all powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. Our 699,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities.Visit us at www.accenture.com
  

**What would you do?** Accenture is a trusted, innovative, comprehensive, and experienced partner to leading platform companies. The Trust and Safety offering within Accenture Operations helps keep the internet safe and helps platform companies accelerate, scale, and improve their businesses. You will be responsible for the quality assurance of Content Moderation whose role includes analyzing and reviewing user profiles, audio, videos, and text\-based content and/or investigating, escalating and/or resolving issues that are reported by users or flagged by the system. Due to the nature of the role, the individual and you may be exposed to flashing lights or contrasting light and dark patterns. Content moderation is meaningful work that helps keep the internet safe. It may also be challenging, at times. In the context of this role, individuals may be directly or inadvertently exposed to potentially objectionable and sensitive content (e.g., graphic, violent, sexual, or egregious). Therefore, any role supporting content moderation needs strong resilience and coping skills. We care for the health and well\-being of our people and provide the support and resources needed to perform their role responsibilities. Active participation in Accenture’s well\-being support program, designed specifically for the Trust \& Safety community, provides valuable skills to promote individual and collective well\-being.  

**What are we looking for?** •• Responsible for Quality Audits ensuring service meets the client and org goals and standards of quality. • Need to enforce the defined policy guidelines for all workflows assigned under the Content Moderation scope. • Need to ensure timely quality insights are shared to drive process improvements. • Should ensure timely feedback and individual performance development is tracked and reported. • Should work with the core Operations Team and drive overall quality standards defined as per the process • Data analysis skills to interpret quality metrics and make data\-driven improvements. Conduct RCA, provide feedback, and manage coaching logs. • Cultural Sensitivity and Resilience: Awareness of and respect for diverse cultures, backgrounds, and perspectives in training delivery. Strong coping, emotional resilience, and stress\-management skills. Ability to perform duties objectively, devoid of inherent biases or personal beliefs, in the best interest of client policies. Content Moderation Guidelines: In\-depth understanding of content moderation guidelines and policies specific to the platform or industry. • Digital Literacy: Familiarity with various types of online content, including text, images, videos, and audio. • Attention to Detail: Keen eye for identifying inappropriate, offensive, or harmful content. • Policy Interpretation: Ability to interpret and apply content moderation policies consistently and accurately. • Decision Making: Skill in making well\-informed and consistent content approval or rejection decisions. • Risk Assessment: Capability to assess the potential risks associated with various types of content. • Data Analysis: Basic data analysis skills to identify trends, patterns, and areas of improvement. • Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills to deliver engaging refresher sessions. Active listening skills to understand reviewer questions and concerns. Engage in client discussion for process improvement sessions. • Quality Assurance: Knowledge of quality assurance processes and best practices for maintaining content standards. Proficient in MS Excel/PPT/Word and/or Google Sheets/Docs/Slides with advanced skills in creating reports.
  

**Roles and Responsibilities:** •• Assess the quality of analysts on the project. • Meet volume and quality targets for all quality assurance audits. • Develop and maintain knowledge of client and their business needs processes. • Develop and maintain an understanding of client Service Level Agreements and the department s key performance requirements. • Develop and maintain product, industry, and business and professional skills by participating in on\-the\-job and classroom training. • Participate in process calibration sessions with clients and cross\-vendor. • Take accountability for effectively handling escalations. • Identify root causes for business\-related issues and recommend solutions to improve overall client satisfaction. • Assist with monitoring and tracking incidents to ensure timely resolution. • Deliver individual and group feedback, provide coaching sessions, motivating, and encouraging analysts to improve performance


  

Any Graduation

Add promotion plan with relevant compliance checks, communication to digital and requests for approval • Implement promotion offers like 20% off, check the compliance and approvals with senior members of the team, request voucher code generation from the campaign team, request digital badging and approved promotions • Generate clearance report through canvassing and clearance data, sharing with buying and merchandising to review report and determine next steps Core Competencies • Comfortable with responding to requests from all levels of the organization • Good vermal and written communication • Ability to work effectively in a team environment Other Expectations • Helpful and proactive manner, with a service orientation • Drives issues to resolution • Good organisational skills with the ability to handle and prioritize multiple tasks simultaneously. • Good communication skills \& ability to interface with clients. • Good interpersonal and administrative skills • Experience: o 2\-4 years of experience in pricing and promotion management, or supply chain management o Proven experience in pricing and promotion, S\&OP processes within a fast\-paced, high\-volume environment
  

**Roles and Responsibilities:** •In this role you are required to do analysis and solving of lower\-complexity problems • Your day to day interaction is with peers within Accenture before updating supervisors • In this role you may have limited exposure with clients and/or Accenture management • You will be given moderate level instruction on daily work tasks and detailed instructions on new assignments • The decisions you make impact your own work and may impact the work of others • You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team, with a focused scope of work • Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts

title: Measurement & Report Analyst
description:
**Skill required:** Trust \& Safety \- Reporting Analytics  

**Designation:** Measurement \& Report Analyst  

**Qualifications:**Any Graduation
  

**Years of Experience:**3 to 5 years
  

**About Accenture**  

Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security.Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Technology and Operations services, and Accenture Song— all powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. Our 699,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities.Visit us at www.accenture.com
  

**What would you do?** Accenture is a trusted, innovative, comprehensive, and experienced partner to leading platform companies. The Trust and Safety offering within Accenture Operations helps keep the internet safe and helps platform companies accelerate, scale, and improve their businesses. Content moderators serve as an important line of defense by helping improve the quality and safety of online content while gaining hands\-on job experience. You will deliver value to our clients, while making a larger impact on society.You will be responsible for analyzing and reviewing user profiles, audio, videos, and text\-based content and/or investigating, escalating and/or resolving issues that are reported by users or flagged by the system. Due to the nature of the role, the individual may be exposed to flashing lights or contrasting light and dark patterns Content moderation is meaningful work that helps keep the internet safe. It may also be challenging, at times. In the context of this role, individuals may be directly or inadvertently exposed to potentially objectionable and sensitive content (e.g., graphic, violent, sexual, or egregious). Therefore, content moderators need strong resilience and coping skills. We care for the health and well\-being of our people and provide the support and resources needed to perform their role responsibilities. Active participation in Accenture’s well\-being support program, designed specifically for the Trust \& Safety community, provides valuable skills to promote individual and collective well\-being.  

**What are we looking for?** o Intermediate knowledge of Excel and Power Point applications •Power BI, tableau o Problem\-Solving Skills o Analytical Skills o Attention to Detail o Communication Skills
  

**Roles and Responsibilities:** ••o Real\-Time Monitoring: Monitor live operational metrics like call volumes, agent status, and service levels. o Service Level Agreement (SLA) Adherence: Ensure that service level agreements are being met and take action to address any deviations. o Data Analysis: Analyze real\-time data to identify trends, predict staffing needs, and suggest improvements to workforce management practices. o Performance Management: Monitor employee adherence to schedules, track attendance, and address any deviations. o Reporting and Analysis: RTAs generate reports on various workforce management metrics, including attendance, adherence, and productivity. o Collaboration: Work closely with operations teams, supervisors, and other stakeholders to ensure operational efficiency. o Problem Solving: Identify and address issues that impact service levels, working with relevant teams to find solutions. o Communication: Communicate effectively with team members and stakeholders, keeping them informed about real\-time performance and potential issues.

title: Business Analyst
description:
**Project Role :** Business Analyst  

**Project Role Description :** Analyze an organization and design its processes and systems, assessing the business model and its integration with technology. Assess current state, identify customer requirements, and define the future state and/or business solution. Research, gather and synthesize information.
  

**Must have skills :** PySpark  

**Good to have skills :** Python (Programming Language), Amazon Web Services (AWS)  

Minimum **3** year(s) of experience is required  

**Educational Qualification :** 15 years full time education  

  

Summary: As a Business Analyst, you will engage in a variety of tasks that involve analyzing organizational processes and systems. Your typical day will include assessing the current state of business models, identifying customer requirements, and defining future states or business solutions. You will also conduct research, gather information, and synthesize findings to support decision\-making and strategic planning within the organization. Your role will be pivotal in bridging the gap between business needs and technological solutions, ensuring that the organization operates efficiently and effectively. Roles \& Responsibilities: \- Develop end\-to\-end data pipelines using PySpark, Python, and SQL. \- Build and deploy ETL/ELT solutions leveraging core AWS services. \- Analyze requirements with Clients, BAs, and Tech Leads and convert them into technical designs. \- Ensure code quality, performance optimization, and secure AWS deployments. \- Support production issues, monitor pipelines, and maintain documentation. \- Required active participation/contribution in team discussions. \- Facilitate workshops and meetings to gather requirements and feedback from stakeholders. \- Develop detailed documentation of business processes and system requirements. Professional \& Technical Skills: \- Must To Have Skills: Strong hands\-on experience with PySpark, Python, SQL, and ETL concepts. \- Working knowledge of AWS services (S3, IAM, Glue Catalog, CloudWatch, etc.). \- Good To Have Skills: Experience with Python (Programming Language), Amazon Web Services (AWS). \- Strong analytical skills to assess business processes and identify areas for improvement. \- Ability to communicate effectively with both technical and non\-technical stakeholders. \- Experience in creating process maps and flowcharts to visualize business processes. Additional Information: \- The candidate should have minimum 3 years of experience in PySpark. \- This position is based at our Chennai office. \- A 15 years full time education is required.


  

15 years full time education
